text.8: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ hetu.m ^a^T3.0001^ea^ ^a^M3.0001^ea^ ^a^V3.0001^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- alobha.m pa.ticca  adoso amoho, adosa.m pa.ticca alobho amoho, amoha.m pa.ticca alobho adoso,  lobha.m pa.ticca ^a^V3.0002^ea^ moho, moha.m pa.ticca lobho, dosa.m pa.ticca moho, moha.m pa.ticca doso;  pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... text.150: [03] hetu ca nahetu ca dhammaa nahetussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m,  aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- nahetu eko khandho ca hetuu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m  cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0...  pa.tisandhikkha.ne hetuu ca vatthu ca nahetuuna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ --  hetuu ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ --  hetuu ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa ^b^atthipaccayena^eb^ paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ --  hetuu ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.151: [03] hetu ca nahetu ca dhammaa hetussa ^a^T3.0023^ea^ ca nahetussa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m,  purejaata.m. sahajaato^eb^ -- nahetu eko khandho ca alobho ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m adosassa  amohassa cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo (cakka.m). nahetu eko khandho  ca lobho ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m mohassa cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo  (cakka.m); pa.tisandhikkha.ne nahetu eko khandho ca alobho ca (cakka.m). pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0...  alobho ca vatthu ca adosassa amohassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo,  lobho ca vatthu ca mohassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo....
text.152: [03] natthipaccayena paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.155: [03] 42^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^V3.0021^ea^ tii.ni, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate  nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate tii.ni,  aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni, vipaake nava, aahaare tii.ni, indriye nava, jhaane tii.ni,  magge ^a^M3.0019^ea^ nava, sampayutte nava, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa nava, vigate  nava, avigate nava (eva.m anumajjantena ga.netabba.m).
text.158: [03] 43^b^.^eb^ hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena  ^a^T3.0024^ea^ paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

text.335: [03] sahetuka~nca ahetuka~nca dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho sahetuko dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- vicikicchaasahagata.m  ^a^T3.0044^ea^ uddhaccasahagata.m eka.m khandha~nca moha~nca sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0....  (1)
text.337: [03] 89^b^.^eb^ sahetuka.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho sahetuko dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayaa -- sahetuka.m  eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)
text.339: [03] 90^b^.^eb^ sahetuka.m ^a^V3.0044^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho sahetuko dhammo uppajjati anantarapaccayaa... samanantarapaccayaa...  sahajaatapaccayaa...pe0... vipaakapaccayaa -- vipaaka.m sahetuka.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo  khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....
text.340: [03] ahetuka.m ^a^M3.0037^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho ahetuko dhammo uppajjati vipaakapaccayaa -- vipaaka.m  ahetuka.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0...  jhaanapaccayaa...pe0... avigatapaccayaa.
text.343: [03] 91^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne cha, adhipatiyaa eka.m, anantare cha, samanantare cha, sahajaate  cha, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye cha, upanissaye cha, purejaate cha...pe0... vipaake dve,  aahaare cha, indriye cha, jhaane cha, magge pa~nca...pe0... avigate cha (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.347: [03] 92^b^.^eb^ sahetuka.m ^a^T3.0045^ea^ ^a^V3.0045^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho ahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- vicikicchaasahagate  uddhaccasahagate khandhe sa.msa.t.tho vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
text.348: [01] ahetuka.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho ahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m eka.m  khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (sa.mkhitta.m).  (1)
text.351: [03] 93^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa dve, naadhipatiyaa cha, napurejaate cha, napacchaajaate cha, naaasevane cha,  nakamme cattaari, navipaake cha, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, navippayutte cha (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.355: [03] 94^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0038^ea^ naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, napurejaate tii.ni, napacchaajaate  tii.ni, naaasevane tii.ni, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake tii.ni, navippayutte tii.ni.
text.359: [03] 95^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V3.0046^ea^ aaramma.ne dve, anantare dve...pe0... kamme dve, vipaake eka.m,  aahaare dve...pe0... magge eka.m...pe0... avigate dve (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.366: [03] 96^b^.^eb^ sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo  ^a^T3.0046^ea^ -- sahetukaa hetuu  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

text.368: [03] sahetuko ^a^M3.0039^ea^ ^a^V3.0047^ea^ dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo --  sahetukaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena  paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)
text.369: [03] 97^b^.^eb^ ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- vicikicchaasahagato  uddhaccasahagato moho cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.370: [03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato  moho sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.371: [03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- vicikicchaasahagato  uddhaccasahagato moho sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena  paccayo. (3)
text.373: [03] 98^b^.^eb^ sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0...  uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, jhaanaa  vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati. ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti,  phala.m paccavekkhanti. pahiine kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe...pe0...  sahetuke ^a^T3.0047^ea^ khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; kusalaakusale niruddhe  sahetuko vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati; cetopariya~naa.nena sahetukacittasama"ngissa  citta.m jaananti. aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... sahetukaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa,  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo; sahetuke khandhe aarabbha sahetukaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (1)
text.374: [03] sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sahetuke  khandhe aniccato ^a^V3.0048^ea^ ...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati, kusalaakusale niruddhe ahetuko vipaako tadaaramma.nataa  uppajjati, sahetuke khandhe aarabbha ahetukaa khandhaa ca moho ca uppajjanti. (2)
text.375: [03] sahetuko ^a^M3.0040^ea^ dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo --  sahetuke khandhe aarabbha vicikicchaasahagataa uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa ca moho ca uppajjanti.  (3)
text.376: [03] 99^b^.^eb^ ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nibbaana.m aavajjanaaya  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... ahetuke khandhe ca moha~nca aniccato...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati; kusalaakusale niruddhe ahetuko vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati;  ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... ahetuke  khandhe ca moha~nca aarabbha ahetukaa khandhaa ca moho ca uppajjanti ^a^T3.0048^ea^. (1)
text.377: [03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti;  nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ariyaa  ahetuke pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe...pe0...  cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m...pe0... ahetuke khandhe ca moha~nca aniccato...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati; kusalaakusale niruddhe sahetuko vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati;  dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena  ahetukacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti; ahetukaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa,  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ahetuke  khandhe ca moha~nca aarabbha sahetukaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (2)
text.378: [03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- cakkhu.m  aarabbha vicikicchaasahagataa uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa ca moho ca uppajjanti;  sota.m ^a^V3.0049^ea^ ...pe0...  vatthu.m... ahetuke khandhe ca moha~nca aarabbha vicikicchaasahagataa uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa  ca moho ca uppajjanti. (3)
text.379: [03] 100^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammaa sahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo --  vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca moha~nca aarabbha sahetukaa khandhaa uppajjanti.  (1)
text.380: [03] sahetuko ^a^M3.0041^ea^ ca ahetuko ca dhammaa ahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo --  vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca moha~nca aarabbha ahetukaa khandhaa  ^a^T3.0049^ea^ ca moho ca uppajjanti. (2)

text.383: [03] 101^b^.^eb^ sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m  katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa  magga.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... phala.m...pe0... sahetuke khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti  abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  sahetukaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. text.386: [03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ariyaa  nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa  adhipatipaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... ahetuke khandhe garu.m katvaa  assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m ^a^T3.0050^ea^ garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (1)
text.388: [03] 102^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ^a^M3.0042^ea^ dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa  purimaa sahetukaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m sahetukaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena  paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m  maggassa... maggo phalassa... phala.m phalassa... anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa  vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.389: [03] sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa vicikicchaasahagataa  uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa pacchimassa pacchimassa vicikicchaasahagatassa uddhaccasahagatassa mohassa  anantarapaccayena paccayo; sahetuka.m cuticitta.m ahetukassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo; sahetuka.m bhava"nga.m aavajjanaaya anantarapaccayena paccayo; sahetuka.m bhava"nga.m ahetukassa  bhava"ngassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; sahetukaa khandhaa ahetukassa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.390: [03] sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa  purimaa vicikicchaasahagataa uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m vicikicchaasahagataana.m  uddhaccasahagataana.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.391: [03] 103^b^.^eb^ ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena   paccayo -- purimo purimo ^a^V3.0051^ea^  vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho pacchimassa ^a^T3.0051^ea^ pacchimassa vicikicchaasahagatassa uddhaccasahagatassa  mohassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; purimaa purimaa ahetukaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m  ahetukaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; aavajjanaa pa~ncanna.m vi~n~naa.naana.m anantarapaccayena  paccayo. text.400: [03] 106^b^.^eb^ sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- sahetukaa khandhaa  sahetukaana.m khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

text.402: [03] sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo,  pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- sahetukaa khandhaa vicikicchaasahagataana.m  uddhaccasahagataana.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.403: [03] 107^b^.^eb^ ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo,  pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- kaayika.m sukha.m kaayikassa sukhassa,  kaayikassa dukkhassa, mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo; kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu...  bhojana.m... senaasana.m kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa,  mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena ^a^V3.0053^ea^  paccayo; moho kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena  paccayo; kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu... bhojana.m, senaasana.m,  moho ca kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. text.404: [03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- kaayika.m  sukha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu.m...  bhojana.m... senaasana.m... moha.m upanissaaya ^a^M3.0045^ea^ daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m  bhindati; kaayika.m sukha.m...pe0... moho ca saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya raagassa...pe0...  patthanaaya maggassa phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. text.405: [03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ^a^T3.0054^ea^ ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo,  pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- kaayika.m sukha.m moho ca vicikicchaasahagataana.m  uddhaccasahagataana.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. text.408: [03] sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammaa sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^.   pakatuupanissayo -- vicikicchaasahagataa ^a^V3.0054^ea^  uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa ca moho ca vicikicchaasahagataana.m uddhaccasahagataana.m khandhaana.m mohassa  ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.410: [03] 109^b^.^eb^ ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati, kusalaakusale niruddhe ahetuko vipaako tadaaramma.nataa  uppajjati; ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa ^a^T3.0055^ea^ ...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena  paccayo ^a^M3.0046^ea^. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... purejaata.m vatthu ahetukaana.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca purejaatapaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.411: [03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m.  ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m  uppajjati; kusalaakusale niruddhe sahetuko vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati; dibbena  cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ --  vatthu sahetukaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.412: [03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aarabbha vicikicchaasahagataa  uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa ca moho ca uppajjanti. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu vicikicchaasahagataana.m  uddhaccasahagataana.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.414: [03] 110^b^.^eb^ sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa sahetukaa  khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.415: [03] ahetuko ^a^V3.0055^ea^ dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa ahetukaa  khandhaa ca moho ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.416: [03] sahetuko ^a^T3.0056^ea^ ca ahetuko ca dhammaa ahetukassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa  vicikicchaasahagataa uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa ca moho ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa  pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.417: [03] sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo (anantarasadisa.m. aavajjanampi  bhava"ngampi natthi, aasevanapaccaye vajjetabbaa navapi ).
text.419: [03] 111^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ^a^M3.0047^ea^ dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa,  naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- sahetukaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena  paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- sahetukaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m  sahetukaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.420: [03] sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa.  ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- sahetukaa cetanaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- sahetukaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m ahetukaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa  ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.421: [03] sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa,  naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- sahetukaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca  ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- sahetukaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m  sahetukaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena ^a^T3.0057^ea^ paccayo. (3)
text.422: [03] ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- ahetukaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m  ^a^V3.0056^ea^ khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (1)
text.424: [03] 112^b^.^eb^ sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaako sahetuko  eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (1)
text.425: [03] sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaakaa sahetukaa  khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vipaakapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (2)
text.426: [03] sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaako  sahetuko eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m...pe0... dve  khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)
text.427: [03] ahetuko ^a^M3.0048^ea^ dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaako  ahetuko eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m...pe0... dve  khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa vipaakapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.429: [03] 113^b^.^eb^ sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.430: [03] ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- ahetukaa aahaaraa sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro imassa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.432: [03] 114^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ^a^T3.0058^ea^ ^a^V3.0057^ea^ dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.433: [03] ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- ahetukaa indriyaa sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... cakkhundriya.m  cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayindriya.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa indriyapaccayena paccayo; ruupajiivitindriya.m  ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.434: [03] sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa jhaanapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.435: [03] ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa jhaanapaccayena paccayo -- ahetukaani jhaana"ngaani sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
text.436: [03] sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa maggapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.437: [03] sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa sampayuttapaccayena paccayo (pa.ticcavaare sampayuttasadisaa  cha pa~nhaa).
text.439: [03] 115^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ^a^M3.0049^ea^ dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo --  sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- sahetukaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena  paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne sahetukaa khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.  ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- sahetukaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena  ^a^T3.0059^ea^ paccayo.  (1)
text.440: [03] ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m,  pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- ahetukaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena  paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne ahetukaa khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo;  khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena ^a^V3.0058^ea^ paccayo; vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.  ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...  vatthu ahetukaana.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- ahetukaa  khandhaa ca moho ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.441: [03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m.  ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu sahetukaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.  ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu sahetukaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.442: [03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ --  vatthu vicikicchaasahagataana.m uddhaccasahagataana.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.  (3)
text.443: [03] sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammaa ahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo --  sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- vicikicchaasahagataa uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa ca moho  ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- vicikicchaasahagataa  uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa ca moho ^a^T3.0060^ea^ ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.445: [03] 116^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ^a^M3.0050^ea^ dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahetuko  eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (1)
text.446: [03] sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ --  sahetukaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; vicikicchaasahagataa  uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa mohassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- sahetukaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo.  (2)
text.447: [03] sahetuko ^a^V3.0059^ea^ dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahetuko  eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; vicikicchaasahagato  uddhaccasahagato eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne sahetuko...pe0.... (3)
text.448: [03] 117^b^.^eb^ ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m,  pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- ahetuko eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0...  vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo;  pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (yaava asa~n~nasattaa kaatabba.m). ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0...  vatthu.m ^a^T3.0061^ea^ aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, kusalaakusale niruddhe ahetuko  vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati; ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m  kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa  atthipaccayena paccayo; vatthu ahetukaana.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ --  ahetukaa khandhaa ca moho ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro^eb^ ^a^M3.0051^ea^ imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m  atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.449: [03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ --  vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo;  pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu sahetukaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0...  vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; kusalaakusale niruddhe sahetuko  vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa  sadda.m su.naati, vatthu sahetukaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.450: [03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m,  purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m ^a^V3.0060^ea^ cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0...  vatthu.m aarabbha vicikicchaasahagataa uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa ^a^T3.0062^ea^ ca moho ca uppajjanti, vatthu  vicikicchaasahagataana.m uddhaccasahagataana.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.451: [03] 118^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammaa sahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo --  sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato eko khandho ca  moho ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0...  pa.tisandhikkha.ne sahetuko eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- sahetuko eko khandho ca  vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0....  (1)
text.452: [03] sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammaa ahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m,  purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- sahetukaa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa  ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; vicikicchaasahagataa uddhaccasahagataa  khandhaa ca moho ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne sahetukaa  khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena ^a^M3.0052^ea^ paccayo. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ --  vicikicchaasahagataa uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa ca vatthu ca mohassa atthipaccayena paccayo.  ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- vicikicchaasahagataa uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa ca moho ca purejaatassa  imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- sahetukaa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- sahetukaa  ^a^T3.0063^ea^ khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.453: [03] sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammaa sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena  paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato eko  khandho ca moho ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0....  ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m  mohassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... (3)
text.456: [03] 119^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^V3.0061^ea^ cha, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate  nava, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate tii.ni,  aasevane nava, kamme cattaari, vipaake cattaari, aahaare cattaari, indriye cattaari,  jhaane cattaari, magge tii.ni, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa  nava, vigate nava, avigate nava (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.459: [03] 120^b^.^eb^ sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.460: [03] sahetuko ^a^M3.0053^ea^ dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo... upanissayapaccayena ^a^T3.0064^ea^ paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo.  (2)
text.461: [03] sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.462: [03] 121^b^.^eb^ ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena ^a^V3.0062^ea^  paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena  paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.463: [03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...  upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.464: [03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.465: [03] 122^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammaa sahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo...  sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.466: [03] sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammaa ahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo...  sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.467: [03] sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammaa sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.469: [03] 123^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^T3.0065^ea^ ^a^M3.0054^ea^ nava...pe0... (sabbattha nava) noavigate nava (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.473: [03] 124^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne cha, naadhipatiyaa cha, naanantare cha, nasamanantare cha, naa~n~nama~n~ne  dve, naupanissaye cha...pe0... namagge cha, nasampayutte dve, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyaa  cha, novigate cha (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.477: [03] 125^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare nava, samanantare nava,  sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate  tii.ni, aasevane nava, kamme cattaari, vipaake cattaari, aahaare cattaari, indriye  cattaari, jhaane cattaari, magge tii.ni, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa nava,  natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate nava (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.483: [03] 126^b^.^eb^ hetusampayutta.m ^a^T3.0066^ea^ ^a^M3.0055^ea^ ^a^V3.0064^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati  hetupaccayaa -- hetusampayutta.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0...  pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
text.484: [03] hetusampayutta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- hetusampayutte  khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)
text.491: [03] 127^b^.^eb^ hetu~nceva ^a^V3.0065^ea^ sahetuka~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati  hetupaccayaa -- alobha.m pa.ticca adoso amoho (cakka.m). lobha.m pa.ticca moho  (cakka.m); pa.tisandhikkha.ne alobha.m pa.ticca adoso amoho (cakka.m). (1)
text.492: [03] hetu~nceva sahetuka~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  hetu.m pa.ticca sampayuttakaa khandhaa; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)
text.493: [03] hetu~nceva sahetuka~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu ceva sahetuko ^a^T3.0067^ea^ ca sahetuko ceva na ca  hetu ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- alobha.m pa.ticca adoso amoho sampayuttakaa  ca khandhaa (cakka.m). lobha.m pa.ticca moho sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa (cakka.m); pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (3)
text.494: [03] 128^b^.^eb^ sahetuka~nceva ^a^M3.0056^ea^ na ca hetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu  dhammo uppajjati ^a^V3.0066^ea^ hetupaccayaa -- sahetuka~nceva na ca hetu.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0...  dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....(1)
text.495: [01] sahetuka~nceva na ca hetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati  hetupaccayaa -- sahetuke ceva na ca hetuu khandhe pa.ticca hetuu; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (2)
text.496: [01] sahetuka~nceva na ca hetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva  na ca hetu ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- sahetuka~nceva na ca hetu.m eka.m khandha.m  pa.ticca tayo khandhaa hetu ca...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (3)
text.497: [03] 129^b^.^eb^ hetu~nceva sahetuka~nca sahetuka~nceva na ca hetu~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu ceva  sahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- alobha~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe pa.ticca  adoso amoho (cakka.m). lobha~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe pa.ticca moho (cakka.m);  pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
text.498: [01] hetu~nceva sahetuka~nca sahetuka~nceva na ca hetu~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca sahetuko ceva na  ca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- sahetuka~nceva na ca hetu.m eka.m khandha~nca hetu~nca  pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)
text.499: [01] hetu~nceva sahetuka~nca sahetuka~nceva na ca hetu~nca dhamma.m ^a^T3.0068^ea^ pa.ticca hetu ceva sahetuko  ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- sahetuka~nceva na ca  hetu.m eka.m khandha~nca alobha~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa adoso amoho ca...pe0... dve  khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)
text.503: [03] 130^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava...pe0... (sabbattha nava),  avigate nava (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.507: [03] 131^b^.^eb^ hetu~nceva ^a^M3.0057^ea^ ^a^V3.0067^ea^ sahetuka~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu ceva sahetuko ca  dhammo uppajjati naadhipatipaccayaa -- alobha.m pa.ticca adoso amoho (cakka.m); pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0...  (paripu.n.na.m nava), napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava.
text.509: [03] 132^b^.^eb^ hetu~nceva sahetuka~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati  nakammapaccayaa -- hetu.m pa.ticca sampayuttakaa cetanaa. (1)
text.510: [01] sahetuka~nceva na ca hetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo uppajjati  nakammapaccayaa -- sahetuke ceva na ca hetuu khandhe pa.ticca sampayuttakaa cetanaa; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....
text.511: [01] hetu~nceva sahetuka~nca sahetuka~nceva na ca hetu~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca sahetuko ceva na  ca hetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa -- hetu~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe pa.ticca sampayuttakaa  cetanaa... navipaakapaccayaa... navippayuttapaccayaa.
text.514: [03] 133^b^.^eb^ naadhipatiyaa ^a^T3.0069^ea^ nava, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme tii.ni,  navipaake nava, navippayutte nava (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.518: [03] 134^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0058^ea^ ^a^V3.0068^ea^ naadhipatiyaa nava, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava,  naaasevane nava, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake nava, navippayutte nava (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.522: [03] 135^b^.^eb^ naadhipatipaccayaa hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne nava, anantare nava...pe0... avigate nava  (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.529: [03] 136^b^.^eb^ hetu ^a^V3.0069^ea^ ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena  paccayo -- alobho adosassa amohassa hetupaccayena paccayo (yathaa pa.ticcavaarasadisa.m). (1)
text.530: [03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena  paccayo -- hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (2)
text.531: [03] hetu ^a^M3.0059^ea^ ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa  ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa ^a^T3.0070^ea^ hetupaccayena paccayo -- alobho adosassa amohassa sampayuttakaana~nca  khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo (vitthaaretabba.m). (3)
text.533: [03] 137^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo -- hetu.m aarabbha hetuu uppajjanti. (1)
text.534: [03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo -- hetu.m aarabbha sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu khandhaa uppajjanti. (2)
text.535: [03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca  hetussa ^a^V3.0070^ea^ ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- hetu.m aarabbha hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa  uppajjanti. (3)
text.536: [03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati,  pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati. jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa  vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti. pahiine kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite  kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. sahetuke ceva  na ca hetuu khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. cetopariya~naa.nena sahetukaa  ceva na ca hetucittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati; aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0...  aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu khandhaa  iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa  ^a^T3.0071^ea^, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.537: [03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo -- daana.m datvaa... (yathaa pa.thamagamana.m eva.m ninnaana.m). (2)
text.538: [03] sahetuko ^a^M3.0060^ea^ ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa  ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa... (yathaa pa.thamagamana.m  eva.m ninnaana.m). (3)
text.539: [03] 138^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammaa hetussa ceva  sahetukassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- hetu~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe aarabbha  hetuu uppajjanti. (1)
text.540: [03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammaa sahetukassa ceva na ca  hetussa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- hetu~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe aarabbha sahetukaa  ceva na ca hetuu khandhaa uppajjanti. (2)
text.541: [03] hetu ^a^V3.0071^ea^ ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammaa hetussa ceva sahetukassa  ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- hetu~nca sampayuttake  ca khandhe aarabbha hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)
text.543: [03] 139^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena  paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- hetu.m garu.m  katvaa hetuu uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- hetu ceva sahetukaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m  hetuuna.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.544: [03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena  paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- hetu.m garu.m katvaa  sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- hetu ceva sahetukaadhipati  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.545: [03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca  hetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena ^a^T3.0072^ea^ paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ --  hetu.m garu.m katvaa ^a^M3.0061^ea^ hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  hetu ceva sahetukaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetuuna~nca adhipatipaccayena paccayo.  (3)
text.546: [03] 140^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena  paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0...  uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0...  jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa  magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, sahetuke ceva  na ca hetuu khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati,  di.t.thi ^a^V3.0072^ea^ uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sahetuko ceva na ca hetu adhipati sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.547: [03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena  paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa...  (pa.thamagamana.myeva). ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sahetuko ceva na ^a^T3.0073^ea^ ca hetu adhipati sampayuttakaana.m  hetuuna.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.548: [03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa  ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ --  daana.m datvaa... (pa.thamagamana.myeva). ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sahetuko ceva na ca hetu adhipati  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetuuna~nca adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.549: [03] 141^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammaa hetussa ceva  sahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- hetuu ca sampayuttake  ca khandhe garu.m katvaa hetuu uppajjanti. (1)
text.550: [03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammaa sahetukassa ceva na ca  hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ ^a^M3.0062^ea^ -- hetu~nca  sampayuttake ca khandhe garu.m katvaa sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu khandhaa uppajjanti.  (2)
text.551: [03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammaa hetussa ceva sahetukassa  ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ --  hetu~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe garu.m katvaa hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti.  (3)
text.553: [03] 142^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena  ^a^V3.0073^ea^ paccayo -- purimaa purimaa hetuu pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m hetuuna.m anantarapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.554: [03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo -- purimaa purimaa ^a^T3.0074^ea^ hetuu pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m sahetukaana~nceva na ca hetuuna.m  khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.555: [03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca  hetussa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa hetuu pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m  hetuuna.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.556: [03] 143^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo -- purimaa purimaa sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m  sahetukaana~nceva na ca hetuuna.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa...  anuloma.m vodaanassa...pe0... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.557: [03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo --  purimaa purimaa sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m hetuuna.m  anantarapaccayena paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa... (sa.mkhitta.m). (2)
text.558: [03] sahetuko ^a^M3.0063^ea^ ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa  ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa sahetukaa  ceva na ca hetuu khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m hetuuna.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena  paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa...pe0.... (3)
text.559: [03] (sahetuko ceva na ca hetumuulaka.m tii.nipi ekasadisaa.)
text.560: [03] 144^b^.^eb^ hetu ^a^V3.0074^ea^ ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammaa hetussa ceva  sahetukassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo ^a^T3.0075^ea^ -- purimaa purimaa hetuu ca sampayuttakaa  ca khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m hetuuna.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.561: [03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammaa sahetukassa ceva na ca  hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa  pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m sahetukaana~nceva na ca hetuuna.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo.(2)
text.562: [03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammaa hetussa ceva sahetukassa  ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa  hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m hetuuna.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m  anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.564: [03] 145^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... nissayapaccayena paccayo (tii.nipi paccayaa pa.ticcavaare  hetusadisaa).
text.566: [03] 146^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo --  hetuu hetuuna.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) hetuu sahetukaana~nceva   ^a^M3.0064^ea^ na ca hetuuna.m khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) hetuu  hetuuna.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo (imesa.m dvinnampi pa~nhaana.m  muulaani pucchitabbaani).
text.567: [03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa  ^a^T3.0076^ea^ upanissayapaccayena  ^a^V3.0075^ea^ paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^.  pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti,  maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati, siila.m...pe0... patthana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0...  sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... patthanaa saddhaaya...pe0... patthanaaya maggassa phalasamaapattiyaa  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.568: [03] (sahetuko ceva na ca hetumuulake iminaakaarena vitthaaretabbaa avasesaa dve pa~nhaa.)
text.569: [03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammaa hetussa ceva sahetukassa  ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^.  pakatuupanissayo -- hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa hetuuna.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo.  (dve muulaani pucchitabbaani) hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa sahetukaana~nceva na ca hetuuna.m  khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m pucchitabba.m) hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa  hetuuna.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.571: [03] 147^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa aasevanapaccayena  paccayo (anantarasadisa.m).

text.574: [03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa  kammapaccayena paccayo ^a^V3.0076^ea^ --  sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m  hetuuna.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- sahetukaa  ceva na ca hetuu cetanaa vipaakaana.m hetuuna.m kammapaccayena paccayo. text.585: [03] 151^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate  nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni, vipaake  nava, aahaare tii.ni, indriye nava, jhaane tii.ni, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyaa  nava, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate nava (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.588: [03] 152^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

text.606: [03] 157^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate  tii.ni, a~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, nissaye tii.ni, upanissaye nava, aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni,  vipaake tii.ni, aahaare tii.ni, indriye tii.ni, jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte  tii.ni, atthiyaa tii.ni, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).

text.683: [03] 176^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^V3.0088^ea^ sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m  datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani  paccavekkhati; jhaana.m...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m  paccavekkhanti; pahiine kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe...pe0...  nahetuu sahetuke khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; kusalaakusale  niruddhe nahetu sahetuko vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati; cetopariya~naa.nena nahetusahetukacittasama"ngissa  ^a^T3.0087^ea^ citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m...pe0... nahetuu  sahetukaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa,  yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; nahetuu sahetuke  khandhe aarabbha nahetuu sahetukaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (1)
text.684: [03] nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nahetuu sahetuke  khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m ^a^M3.0075^ea^ uppajjati, kusalaakusale niruddhe  nahetu ahetuko vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati, nahetuu sahetuke khandhe aarabbha  nahetuu ahetukaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (2)
text.685: [03] 177^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^V3.0089^ea^ ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nibbaana.m  aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... nahetuu ahetuke khandhe  aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; kusalaakusale niruddhe nahetu ahetuko  vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m  kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... nahetuu ahetuke khandhe aarabbha nahetuu ahetukaa khandhaa  uppajjanti. (1)
text.686: [03] nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa nibbaana.m  paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo;  cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... nahetuu ahetuke khandhe aniccato ^a^T3.0088^ea^ ...pe0... domanassa.m  uppajjati; kusalaakusale niruddhe nahetu sahetuko vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati;  dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. cetopariya~naa.nena  nahetuahetukacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. nahetuu ahetukaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa,  cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo; nahetuu ahetuke khandhe aarabbha nahetuu sahetukaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (2)
text.688: [03] 178^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m  katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati,  jhaana.m...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m  garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. nahetuu sahetuke khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati,  ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- nahetusahetukaadhipati  ^a^M3.0076^ea^ sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.689: [03] nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  nahetu sahetukaadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.690: [03] nahetu ^a^V3.0090^ea^ sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa ca nahetuahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena  paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- nahetu sahetukaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m ^a^T3.0089^ea^ khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca  ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.691: [03] nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ --  ariyaa nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa,  phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... nahetuu ahetuke khandhe  garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati.  (1)
text.693: [03] 179^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa  purimaa nahetuu sahetukaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m nahetusahetukaana.m khandhaana.m  anantarapaccayena paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.694: [03] nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- nahetu sahetuka.m  cuticitta.m nahetuahetukassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; nahetu sahetuka.m  bhava"nga.m aavajjanaaya, nahetu sahetuka.m bhava"nga.m nahetuahetukassa bhava"ngassa, nahetuu sahetukaa  khandhaa nahetuahetukassa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.695: [03] nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa  nahetuu ahetukaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m ^a^M3.0077^ea^ nahetuahetukaana.m khandhaana.m  anantarapaccayena paccayo; aavajjanaa pa~ncanna.m vi~n~naa.naana.m anantarapaccayena  ^a^T3.0090^ea^ paccayo. (1)
text.696: [03] nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- nahetu ahetuka.m  cuticitta.m nahetusahetukassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; aavajjanaa nahetusahetukaana.m  ^a^V3.0091^ea^ khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; nahetuu ahetukaa khandhaa nahetusahetukassa vu.t.thaanassa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. text.698: [03] 180^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo...  sahajaatapaccayena paccayo (iha gha.tanaa natthi, satta pa~nhaa)... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo (cha  pa~nhaa)... nissayapaccayena paccayo (pavattipa.tisandhi satta pa~nhaa, iha gha.tanaa natthi).
text.700: [03] 181^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo --  ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo --  saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0...  patthana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... patthanaa  saddhaaya...pe0... patthanaaya maggassa phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.701: [03] nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo,  pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- saddhaa kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa  dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; siila.m...pe0... patthanaa kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa  ^a^T3.0091^ea^ dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; saddhaa...pe0... patthanaa kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa  dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.702: [03] 182^b^.^eb^ nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo --  ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- kaayika.m sukha.m  kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa ^a^M3.0078^ea^ upanissayapaccayena paccayo;  kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu... bhojana.m... senaasana.m kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa  dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu...  bhojana.m... senaasana.m kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. text.703: [03] nahetu ^a^V3.0092^ea^ ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- kaayika.m  sukha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu.m...  bhojana.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; kaayika.m sukha.m  ...pe0... senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... patthanaaya maggassa phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.705: [03] 183^b^.^eb^ nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo --  aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m  aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; kusalaakusale niruddhe nahetu ahetuko  vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati; ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena ^a^T3.0092^ea^ paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m  cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... vatthu nahetuahetukaana.m  khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.706: [03] nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati, kusalaakusale niruddhe nahetu sahetuko vipaako tadaaramma.nataa  uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati.  ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu nahetusahetukaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. text.746: [03] 195^b^.^eb^ aaramma.ne cattaari, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare cattaari, samanantare cattaari,  sahajaate satta, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattaari, purejaate dve, pacchaajaate  dve, aasevane dve, kamme cattaari, vipaake cattaari, aahaare cattaari, indriye  cattaari, jhaane cattaari ^a^V3.0098^ea^, magge tii.ni, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tii.ni, atthiyaa satta,  natthiyaa cattaari, vigate ^a^T3.0098^ea^ cattaari, avigate satta (eva.m ga.netabba.m)
text.749: [03] 196^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^M3.0084^ea^ sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo.  (1)

text.799: [03] 9^b^.^eb^ sappaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa,  siila.m samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m ^a^T3.0102^ea^ paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0...  jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m  paccavekkhanti; pahiine kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe  samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti, cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... sappaccaye khandhe aniccato...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ^a^V3.0104^ea^ ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m  su.naati. cetopariya~naa.nena sappaccayacittasama"ngissa ^a^M3.0088^ea^ citta.m jaanaati,  aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0...  ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... sappaccayaa  khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa,  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.800: [03] appaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti;  nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.802: [03] 10^b^.^eb^ sappaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m  katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa  maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m garu.m katvaa...pe0...  cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... sappaccaye khandhe garu.m ^a^T3.0103^ea^ katvaa assaadeti abhinandati;  ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sappaccayaadhipati  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. text.890: [03] 33^b^.^eb^ anidassana.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa  ^a^T3.0111^ea^ -- anidassana.m  eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....
text.891: [03] anidassana.m ^a^M3.0096^ea^ ^a^V3.0115^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho anidassano dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa (eva.m  sabba.m sappaccayaga.nanaahi saddhi.m kaatabba.m).
text.897: [03] 34^b^.^eb^ anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- anidassanaa hetuu  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo;  pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
text.898: [03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- anidassanaa hetuu sanidassanaana.m  cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)
text.899: [03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- anidassanaa  hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m sanidassanaana~nca anidassanaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m  hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)
text.901: [03] 35^b^.^eb^ sanidassano ^a^V3.0116^ea^ dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sanidassana.m ruupa.m  aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; sanidassanaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa,  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena ^a^T3.0112^ea^ paccayo. (1)
text.902: [03] anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0...  uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, jhaanaa  vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m ^a^M3.0097^ea^  paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa,  phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ariyaa pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti,  vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... kaaya.m... sadde...pe0...  vatthu.m anidassane khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa  sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena anidassanacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m  vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0...  saddaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... anidassanaa  khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa,  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.904: [03] 36^b^.^eb^ sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ --  sanidassana.m ruupa.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati,  di.t.thi uppajjati. (1)
text.905: [03] anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo ^a^T3.0113^ea^  -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati.  ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ^a^V3.0117^ea^ ta.m garu.m  katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... ariyaa  maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti,  nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa,  phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m anidassane khandhe garu.m katvaa  assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  anidassanaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m  adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.906: [03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  anidassanaadhipati sanidassanaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.907: [03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  anidassanaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ^a^M3.0098^ea^ sanidassanaana~nca anidassanaana~nca  cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.909: [03] 37^b^.^eb^ anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa  anidassanaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m anidassanaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo;  anuloma.m gotrabhussa...pe0... gotrabhu maggassa...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.911: [03] 38^b^.^eb^ anidassano ^a^T3.0114^ea^ dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo... tii.ni... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... eka.m... nissayapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.913: [03] 39^b^.^eb^ sanidassano ^a^V3.0118^ea^ dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- va.n.nasampada.m patthayamaano daana.m...pe0...  siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m karoti, va.n.nasampadaa saddhaaya...pe0... patthanaaya...  kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.914: [03] anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya  daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati;  siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0...  senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.916: [03] 40^b^.^eb^ sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- sanidassana.m ruupa.m  aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ^a^M3.0099^ea^ ruupa.m passati,  ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.917: [03] anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0...  domanassa.m ^a^T3.0115^ea^ uppajjati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, saddaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m  cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu anidassanaana.m  khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.918: [03] sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammaa anidassanassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m^eb^. ruupaayatana~nca vatthu ca anidassanaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena  ^a^V3.0119^ea^ paccayo; ruupaayatana~nca cakkhaayatana~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.920: [03] 41^b^.^eb^ anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa  anidassanaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa anidassanassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.921: [03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa anidassanaa  khandhaa purejaatassa imassa sanidassanassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.922: [03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo --  pacchaajaataa anidassanaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca kaayassa  pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.924: [03] 42^b^.^eb^ anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa  anidassanaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m anidassanaana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... anuloma.m  gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa aasevanapaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.926: [03] 43^b^.^eb^ anidassano ^a^T3.0116^ea^ ^a^M3.0100^ea^ dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa,  naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaana~nca  cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ --  anidassanaa ^a^V3.0120^ea^ cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaana~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m kammapaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.927: [03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^  (vitthaaretabba.m). (2)
text.928: [03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaataa,  naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ (vitthaaretabba.m). (3)
text.930: [03] 44^b^.^eb^ anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni...  aahaarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni (tiisupi kaba.liikaaro aahaaro kaatabbo)... indriyapaccayena  paccayo... tii.ni (tiisupi ruupajiivitindriya.m)... jhaanapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni...  maggapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... eka.m.
text.932: [03] 45^b^.^eb^ anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m,  purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa khandhaa anidassanaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m  ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaa khandhaa anidassanaana.m  ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo,  vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo ^a^T3.0117^ea^. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu anidassanaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena  paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa anidassanassa kaayassa  vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.933: [03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m.  ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa khandhaa sanidassanaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ^a^M3.0101^ea^ ruupaana.m  vippayuttapaccayena ^a^V3.0121^ea^ paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa khandhaa  purejaatassa imassa sanidassanassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.934: [03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo --  sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa khandhaa sanidassanaana~nca anidassanaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m  ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa  khandhaa purejaatassa imassa sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.  (3)
text.936: [03] 46^b^.^eb^ sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sanidassana.m ruupa.m  aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa  atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.937: [03] anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m,  pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- anidassano ^a^T3.0118^ea^ eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m  khandhaana.m anidassanaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve  khandhe...pe0... (sa.mkhitta.m. yaava asa~n~nasattaa). ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0...  vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati,  saddaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... cakkhaayatana.m  cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu anidassanaana.m  khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa  anidassanassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa anidassanassa  kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ anidassanaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.938: [03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m,  indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa khandhaa sanidassanaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m  ruupaana.m ^a^V3.0122^ea^ atthipaccayena  paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... mahaabhuutaa sanidassanaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m  ka.tattaaruupaana.m ^a^M3.0102^ea^ upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... baahiraa...  aahaarasamu.t.thaanaa... utusamu.t.thaanaa... asa~n~nasattaana.m mahaabhuutaa sanidassanaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m,  upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa  sanidassanassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa sanidassanassa  kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ sanidassanaana.m ^a^T3.0119^ea^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.939: [03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m,  pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- anidassano eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m  sanidassanaana~nca anidassanaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0...  dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... mahaabhuutaa sanidassanaana~nca anidassanaana~nca  cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m, ka.tattaaruupaana.m, upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; baahiraa...  aahaarasamu.t.thaanaa... utusamu.t.thaanaa... asa~n~nasattaana.m mahaabhuutaa sanidassanaana~nca anidassanaana~nca  ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.940: [03] 47^b^.^eb^ sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammaa anidassanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.  ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- ruupaayatana~nca vatthu ca anidassanaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; ruupaayatana~nca  cakkhaayatana~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
text.941: [03] natthipaccayena paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo.
text.944: [03] 48^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare eka.m, samanantare  eka.m ^a^V3.0123^ea^, sahajaate tii.ni, a~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, nissaye tii.ni, upanissaye dve, purejaate tii.ni,  pacchaajaate tii.ni, aasevane eka.m, kamme tii.ni, vipaake tii.ni, aahaare tii.ni,  indriye ^a^M3.0103^ea^ tii.ni, jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte ^a^T3.0120^ea^ eka.m, vippayutte  tii.ni, atthiyaa pa~nca, natthiyaa eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate pa~nca (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
text.947: [03] 49^b^.^eb^ sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.948: [03] anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...  upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo...  kammapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.949: [03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo...  kammapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.950: [03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena  paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo.  (3)
text.951: [01] sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammaa anidassanassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.954: [03] 50^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^V3.0124^ea^ pa~nca, naaaramma.ne cattaari, naadhipatiyaa pa~nca, naanantare pa~nca, nasamanantare  pa~nca, nasahajaate pa~nca, naa~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, nanissaye cattaari, naupanissaye pa~nca, napurejaate  ^a^T3.0121^ea^ cattaari, napacchaajaate pa~nca (sabbattha pa~nca), nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte cattaari,  noatthiyaa cattaari, nonatthiyaa pa~nca, novigate pa~nca, noavigate cattaari.
text.958: [03] 51^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0104^ea^ naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, naanantare tii.ni,  nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni...pe0... nasampayutte tii.ni,  navippayutte eka.m, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
text.962: [03] 52^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V3.0125^ea^ aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare eka.m, samanantare eka.m,  sahajaate tii.ni, a~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, nissaye tii.ni, upanissaye dve, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate  tii.ni, aasevane eka.m, kamme tii.ni...pe0... magge tii.ni, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte  tii.ni, atthiyaa pa~nca, natthiyaa eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate pa~nca.

text.995: [01] (appa.tighamuulaka.m itarepi dve pa~nhaa kaatabbaa. gha.tanepi tii.ni pa~nhaa kaatabbaa. ajjhattikaa  baahiraa mahaabhuutaa sabbe jaanitvaa kaatabbaa.)

text.1036: [03] 69^b^.^eb^ sappa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- cakkhu.m...pe0...  pho.t.thabbe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati,  dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m  kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... sappa.tighaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa,  anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo.
