text.1037: [03] appa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0...  uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m ^a^T3.0130^ea^ paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, jhaanaa  vu.t.thahitvaa ^a^V3.0135^ea^ jhaana.m paccavekkhati, ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti,  phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa,  phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ariyaa pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti,  vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti;  vatthu.m...pe0... itthindriya.m... purisindriya.m... jiivitindriya.m... aapodhaatu.m,  kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; cetopariya~naa.nena  appa.tighacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m ^a^M3.0112^ea^ vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0...  aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... appa.tighaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa,  cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa,  aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. text.1039: [03] 70^b^.^eb^ sappa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ --  cakkhu.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa  raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (1)
text.1040: [03] appa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati.  ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m  garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, jhaanaa  vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m  ^a^T3.0131^ea^ garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti;  nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; vatthu.m...pe0...  itthindriya.m... purisindriya.m... jiivitindriya.m... aapodhaatu.m, kaba.liikaara.m  aahaara.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati,  di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- appa.tighaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m appa.tighaana~nca  cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1041: [03] appa.tigho ^a^V3.0136^ea^ dhammo sappa.tighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.  ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- appa.tighaadhipati  sappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

text.1078: [03] 83^b^.^eb^ sappa.tigho dhammo sappa.tighassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo... eka.m (pa.ticcasadisaa  pa.thamapa~nhaa). (1)

text.1200: [03] 112^b^.^eb^ ruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m...  itthindriya.m... purisindriya.m... jiivitindriya.m... aapodhaatu.m... kaba.liikaara.m  aahaara.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati,  dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ruupino khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa,  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa ^a^V3.0156^ea^, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. text.1201: [03] 113^b^.^eb^ aruupii ^a^M3.0128^ea^ dhammo aruupissa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0...  siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati,  jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti,  nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ariyaa pahiine kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite kilese...pe0...  pubbe...pe0... aruupino khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, cetopariya~naa.nena  aruupicittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0...  aruupino khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa,  yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1203: [03] 114^b^.^eb^ ruupii ^a^T3.0149^ea^ dhammo aruupissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0...  kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago  uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (1)

text.1228: [03] 122^b^.^eb^ ruupii ^a^M3.0131^ea^ dhammo ruupissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- ruupajiivitindriya.m  ^a^T3.0152^ea^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)

text.1230: [03] aruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.1231: [03] ruupii ca aruupii ca dhammaa aruupissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- cakkhundriya~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.na~nca  cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo...pe0... kaayindriya~nca...pe0....
text.1233: [03] 123^b^.^eb^ aruupii ^a^V3.0160^ea^ dhammo aruupissa dhammassa jhaanapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... maggapaccayena paccayo...  tii.ni... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... eka.m.
text.1235: [03] 124^b^.^eb^ ruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m.  ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu aruupiina.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ --  cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu aruupiina.m  khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1236: [03] aruupii dhammo ruupissa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ --  aruupino khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne aruupino  khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; aruupino khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena  paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- aruupino khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.1238: [03] 125^b^.^eb^ ruupii ^a^T3.0153^ea^ ^a^M3.0132^ea^ dhammo ruupissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, aahaara.m,  indriya.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... (yaava asa~n~nasattaa), ^b^kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro^eb^ imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.1239: [03] ruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ --  pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu aruupiina.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0...  kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa  ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa ^a^V3.0161^ea^  ...pe0... kaayaayatana.m  kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu aruupiina.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1240: [03] 126^b^.^eb^ aruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- aruupii eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m  khandhaana.m...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
text.1241: [03] aruupii dhammo ruupissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ --  aruupino khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0...  ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- aruupino khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo.  (2)
text.1242: [03] aruupii dhammo ruupissa ca aruupissa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- aruupii eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0...  pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)
text.1243: [03] 127^b^.^eb^ ruupii ca aruupii ca dhammaa ruupissa dhammassa ^a^T3.0154^ea^ atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m,  aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- aruupii khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m  atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- aruupino khandhaa ca  kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- aruupino  khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1244: [03] ruupii ^a^M3.0133^ea^ ca aruupii ca dhammaa aruupissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m,  purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhaayatana~nca ti.n.nanna.m  khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagato...pe0...  aruupii eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve  khandhaa ca...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne aruupii eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m...pe0...  dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... (2)
text.1245: [03] natthipaccayena ^a^V3.0162^ea^ paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo.
text.1248: [03] 128^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare eka.m, samanantare  eka.m, sahajaate satta, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejaate eka.m,  pacchaajaate eka.m aasevane eka.m, kamme tii.ni, vipaake tii.ni, aahaare cattaari,  indriye cha, jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte dve, atthiyaa satta,  natthiyaa eka.m ^a^T3.0155^ea^, vigate eka.m, avigate satta.
text.1251: [03] 129^b^.^eb^ ruupii dhammo ruupissa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo...  indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1252: [03] ruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena  paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1253: [03] aruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena  paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

text.1257: [03] ruupii ca aruupii ca dhammaa aruupissa dhammassa sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. (2)
text.1260: [03] 130^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa satta, naaaramma.ne satta, naadhipatiyaa satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare  satta, nasahajaate cha, naa~n~nama~n~ne cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejaate satta  ^a^T3.0156^ea^ ...pe0... namagge satta, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pa~nca, noatthiyaa cattaari, nonatthiyaa satta,  novigate satta, noavigate cattaari.
text.1264: [03] 131^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, naanantare  tii.ni, nasamanantare ^a^V3.0164^ea^ tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, naupanissaye tii.ni (sabbattha tii.ni), nasampayutte eka.m, navippayutte  eka.m, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
text.1268: [03] 132^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0135^ea^ aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa cattaari (anulomamaatikaa  kaatabbaa), avigate satta.
text.1275: [03] 133^b^.^eb^ lokiya.m ^a^V3.0165^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- lokiya.m eka.m  khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0...  khandhe pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa, eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca  cittasamu.t.thaana.m ^a^T3.0157^ea^ ruupa.m, ka.tattaaruupa.m, upaadaaruupa.m. (1)
text.1276: [03] 134^b^.^eb^ lokuttara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- lokuttara.m  eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)
text.1277: [03] lokuttara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- lokuttare khandhe  pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (2)
text.1278: [03] lokuttara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa --  lokuttara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0....  (3)
text.1279: [03] lokiya~nca lokuttara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- lokuttare  khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)
text.1282: [03] 135^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^M3.0136^ea^ ^a^V3.0166^ea^ pa~nca, aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa pa~nca, anantare dve, samanantare  dve, sahajaate pa~nca, a~n~nama~n~ne dve, nissaye pa~nca, upanissaye dve, purejaate dve, aasevane  dve, kamme pa~nca, vipaake pa~nca, aahaare pa~nca, indriye pa~nca, jhaane pa~nca, magge pa~nca,  sampayutte dve, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa pa~nca, natthiyaa dve, vigate dve, avigate pa~nca.
text.1286: [03] 136^b^.^eb^ lokiya.m dhamma.m pa.ticca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m lokiya.m  eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ^a^T3.0158^ea^ ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0...  ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (yaava asa~n~nasattaa) vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate  khandhe pa.ticca vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho (sa.mkhitta.m).
text.1289: [03] 137^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^V3.0167^ea^ eka.m, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa dve, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare  tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate cattaari, napacchaajaate pa~nca,  naaasevane pa~nca (naaasevanamuulake lokuttare suddhake vipaakoti niyaametabba.m, avasesaa  pakatikaayeva), nakamme dve, navipaake pa~nca, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane  eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate  tii.ni.
text.1293: [03] 138^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0137^ea^ naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa dve (naanantarapadaadii  paccaniiyasadisaa)...pe0... navipaake pa~nca, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyaa  tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
text.1297: [03] 139^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V3.0168^ea^ aaramma.ne eka.m, anantare eka.m...pe0... avigate eka.m.
text.1304: [03] 140^b^.^eb^ lokiya.m ^a^T3.0159^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- lokiya.m  eka.m khandha.m paccayaa...pe0... eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuute paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m  ruupa.m, ka.tattaaruupa.m, upaadaaruupa.m, vatthu.m paccayaa lokiyaa khandhaa. (1)
text.1305: [03] lokiya.m dhamma.m paccayaa lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- vatthu.m paccayaa  lokuttaraa khandhaa. (2)
text.1306: [03] lokiya.m ^a^M3.0138^ea^ ^a^V3.0169^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa --  vatthu.m paccayaa lokuttaraa khandhaa, mahaabhuute paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (3)

text.1310: [03] lokiya~nca lokuttara~nca dhamma.m paccayaa lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa --  lokuttara.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca paccayaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0...  lokuttare khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (3)
text.1313: [03] 142^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne cattaari, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare  ^a^T3.0160^ea^ cattaari, samanantare cattaari, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne cattaari, nissaye nava, upanissaye cattaari, purejaate  cattaari, aasevane cattaari, kamme nava, vipaake nava...pe0... magge nava, sampayutte  cattaari, vippayutte nava, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa cattaari, vigate cattaari, avigate  nava.
text.1317: [03] 143^b^.^eb^ lokiya.m ^a^M3.0139^ea^ ^a^V3.0170^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa lokiyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa --  ahetuka.m lokiya.m eka.m khandha.m...pe0... (yaava asa~n~nasattaa) cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0...  kaayaayatana.m paccayaa kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, vatthu.m paccayaa ahetukaa lokiyaa khandhaa,  vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthu~nca paccayaa vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato  moho (sa.mkhitta.m).
text.1320: [03] 144^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa eka.m, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa cattaari, naanantare tii.ni...pe0...  naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate cattaari, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava (lokuttare  aruupe vipaakanti niyaametabba.m), nakamme cattaari, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m,  naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte dve,  nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.

text.1328: [03] 146^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0140^ea^ aaramma.ne eka.m, anantare eka.m...pe0... avigate  eka.m.

text.1336: [03] lokuttara.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- lokuttara.m eka.m  khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)
text.1337: [03] (sa.msa.t.thavaaro eva.m vitthaaretabbo, saha ga.nanaahi dve pa~nhaa).
text.1343: [03] 148^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- lokiyaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (1)
text.1344: [03] lokuttaro ^a^M3.0141^ea^ ^a^V3.0173^ea^ dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.1346: [03] 149^b^.^eb^ lokiyo ^a^T3.0162^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0...  siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati,  jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa gotrabhu.m paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m paccavekkhanti, pahiine kilese  paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti;  cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m lokiye khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati;  dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. cetopariya~naa.nena  lokiyacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0...  aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa, lokiyaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa,  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1347: [03] 150^b^.^eb^ lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nibbaana.m maggassa,  phalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1348: [03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa  magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa,  vodaanassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ariyaa cetopariya~naa.nena lokuttaracittasama"ngissa  citta.m jaananti, lokuttaraa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa  ^a^T3.0163^ea^, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1350: [03] 151^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m  ^a^V3.0174^ea^ ...pe0...  pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... sekkhaa gotrabhu.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m  garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m ^a^M3.0142^ea^ lokiye khandhe  garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati.  ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- lokiyaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m  adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1351: [03] 152^b^.^eb^ lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- nibbaana.m maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.  ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- lokuttaraadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.1352: [03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati.  ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti,  phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m  gotrabhussa, vodaanassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- lokuttaraadhipati  cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1353: [03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa ca lokuttarassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^  ^a^T3.0164^ea^ -- lokuttaraadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.1355: [03] 153^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa lokiyaa  khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m lokiyaana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... anuloma.m gotrabhussa...  anuloma.m vodaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1356: [03] lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- gotrabhu maggassa...  vodaana.m ^a^V3.0175^ea^  maggassa... anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m  phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1357: [03] 154^b^.^eb^ lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa  lokuttaraa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m lokuttaraana.m khandhaana.m ^a^M3.0143^ea^ anantarapaccayena  paccayo; maggo phalassa, phala.m phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1358: [03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- phala.m vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.1360: [03] 155^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo  (pa~nca pa~nhaa, gha.tanaa natthi) a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... dve... nissayapaccayena paccayo.
text.1362: [03] 156^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- lokiya.m saddha.m  upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... vipassana.m ^a^T3.0165^ea^ uppaadeti, abhi~n~na.m uppaadeti, samaapatti.m  uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; lokiya.m siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m  upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; lokiyaa saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m  lokiyaaya saddhaaya...pe0... kaayikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; kusalaakusala.m  kamma.m vipaakassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1363: [03] lokiyo dhammo lokuttarasa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^.  pakatuupanissayo -- pa.thamassa maggassa parikamma.m pa.thamassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena  ^a^V3.0176^ea^ paccayo...pe0...  catutthassa maggassa parikamma.m catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1364: [03] 157^b^.^eb^ lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- pa.thamo maggo  dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo...pe0... tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1365: [03] lokuttaro ^a^M3.0144^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- ariyaa magga.m  upanissaaya anuppanna.m samaapatti.m uppaadenti, uppanna.m samaapajjanti, sa"nkhaare aniccato  dukkhato anattato vipassanti, ariyaana.m maggo...pe0... .thaanaa.thaanakosallassa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo; phalasamaapatti kaayikassa sukhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1367: [03] 158^b^.^eb^ lokiyo ^a^T3.0166^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato  anattato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya  sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa  purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu lokiyaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.1368: [03] lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ --  vatthu lokuttaraana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1370: [03] 159^b^.^eb^ lokiyo ^a^V3.0177^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa lokiyaa  khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1371: [03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa lokuttaraa  khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1373: [03] 160^b^.^eb^ lokiyo ^a^T3.0167^ea^ ^a^M3.0145^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa  purimaa lokiyaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m lokiyaana.m khandhaana.m aasevanapaccayena  paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1374: [03] lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m  maggassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1376: [03] 161^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa.  ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- lokiyaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m  kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- lokiyaa cetanaa  vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1377: [03] lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa.  ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- lokuttaraa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo.  ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- lokuttaraa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.1378: [03] lokuttaro ^a^V3.0178^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- lokuttaraa cetanaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m  ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1379: [03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa ca lokuttarassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- lokuttaraa  cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.1381: [03] 162^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaako lokiyo  eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m vipaakapaccayena paccayo...pe0...  dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
text.1382: [03] lokuttaro ^a^M3.0146^ea^ dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.1384: [03] 163^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- lokiyaa aahaaraa  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ^a^T3.0168^ea^ ruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0...  kaba.liikaaro aahaaro imassa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1385: [03] lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.1387: [03] 164^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo (pa.tisandhi kaatabbaa);  cakkhundriya.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayindriya.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa indriyapaccayena  paccayo; ruupajiivitindriya.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1388: [03] lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.1390: [03] 165^b^.^eb^ lokiyo ^a^V3.0179^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa jhaanapaccayena paccayo... eka.m, lokuttaro  dhammo...pe0... tii.ni... maggapaccayena paccayo, lokiye eka.m, lokuttare tii.ni.
text.1391: [03] lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... eka.m, lokuttaro dhammo...pe0...  eka.m.
text.1393: [03] 166^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m,  pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- lokiyaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena  paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; vatthu  khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  kaayaayatana.m ^a^M3.0147^ea^ kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu lokiyaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena  paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- lokiyaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.1394: [03] lokiyo ^a^T3.0169^ea^ dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu  lokuttaraana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1395: [03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m.  ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- lokuttaraa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.  ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- lokuttaraa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.1397: [03] 167^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m,  pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- lokiyo eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m  cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m...pe0... (yaava asa~n~nasattaa). ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0...  vatthu.m ^a^V3.0180^ea^ ...pe0... (purejaatasadisa.m). vatthu lokiyaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo.  ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- lokiyaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo;  ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m  atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1398: [03] lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu lokuttaraana.m  khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1399: [03] 168^b^.^eb^ lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- lokuttaro eko  khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0.... (1)
text.1400: [03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^  ^a^T3.0170^ea^ -- lokuttaraa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ --  lokuttaraa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1401: [03] lokuttaro ^a^M3.0148^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa ca lokuttarassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo --  lokuttaro eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0.... (3)
text.1402: [03] 169^b^.^eb^ lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammaa lokiyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo --  sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- lokuttaraa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa  ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- lokuttaraa khandhaa  ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- lokuttaraa  khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1403: [03] lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammaa lokuttarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m,  purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- lokuttaro eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... (2)
text.1404: [03] natthipaccayena ^a^V3.0181^ea^ paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.1407: [03] 170^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa cattaari, aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare cattaari, samanantare  cattaari, sahajaate pa~nca, a~n~nama~n~ne dve, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattaari, purejaate  dve, pacchaajaate ^a^T3.0171^ea^ dve, aasevane dve, kamme cattaari, vipaake cattaari, aahaare cattaari,  indriye cattaari, jhaane cattaari, magge cattaari, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tii.ni,  atthiyaa satta, natthiyaa cattaari, vigate cattaari, avigate satta.
text.1410: [03] 171^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...  upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena ^a^M3.0149^ea^ paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena  paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo.  (1)

text.1412: [03] 172^b^.^eb^ lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.1413: [03] lokuttaro ^a^V3.0182^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...  upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)

text.1416: [03] lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammaa lokuttarassa dhammassa ^a^T3.0172^ea^ sahajaata.m... purejaata.m. (2)
text.1419: [03] 173^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa satta...pe0... nasamanantare satta, nasahajaate pa~nca, naa~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, nanissaye  pa~nca, naupanissaye satta, napurejaate cha, napacchaajaate satta...pe0... namagge satta,  nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte cattaari, noatthiyaa cattaari, nonatthiyaa satta, novigate  satta, noavigate cattaari.
text.1423: [03] 174^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0150^ea^ naaaramma.ne cattaari...pe0... nasamanantare cattaari,  naa~n~nama~n~ne dve ^a^V3.0183^ea^, naupanissaye cattaari...pe0... namagge cattaari, nasampayutte dve, navippayutte  dve, nonatthiyaa cattaari, novigate cattaari.
text.1427: [03] 175^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa cattaari (anulomamaatikaa kaatabbaa),  avigate satta.
text.1434: [03] 176^b^.^eb^ kenaci ^a^T3.0173^ea^ ^a^V3.0184^ea^ vi~n~neyya.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kenaci vi~n~neyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  kenaci vi~n~neyya.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve  khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhe pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa,  eka.m mahaabhuuta.m pa.ticca tayo mahaabhuutaa...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m  ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (1)
text.1435: [03] kenaci vi~n~neyya.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kenaci navi~n~neyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  kenaci vi~n~neyya.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca kenaci navi~n~neyyaa tayo ^a^M3.0151^ea^ khandhaa  cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhe  pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa, eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m  ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (2)
text.1436: [03] kenaci vi~n~neyya.m dhamma.m pa.ticca kenaci vi~n~neyyo ca kenaci navi~n~neyyo ca dhammaa  uppajjanti ^a^V3.0185^ea^ hetupaccayaa -- kenaci vi~n~neyya.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca kenaci vi~n~neyyaa  ca kenaci navi~n~neyyaa ca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0...  pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhe pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa, eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0...  mahaabhuute pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (3)

text.2413: [03] 5^b^.^eb^ nogantha.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nogantho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m nogantha.m  eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0...  ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne (yaava asa~n~nasattaa), vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe pa.ticca  vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. text.2591: [03] ganthasampayutta~nca ganthavippayutta~nca dhamma.m paccayaa ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca  dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- ganthasampayutta.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca paccayaa tayo khandhaa...pe0...  dve khandhe...pe0... ganthasampayutte khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m,  di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagata.m eka.m khandha~nca lobha~nca paccayaa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0...  dve khandhe...pe0... domanassasahagata.m eka.m khandha~nca pa.tigha~nca paccayaa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca  ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagata.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca  paccayaa tayo khandhaa lobho ca...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... domanassasahagata.m eka.m khandha~nca  vatthu~nca paccayaa tayo khandhaa pa.tigha~nca...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... text.2594: [03] 57^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^M3.0273^ea^ nava, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare  nava (sabbattha nava), vipaake eka.m, aahaare nava...pe0... avigate nava.
text.2598: [03] 58^b^.^eb^ ganthavippayutta.m ^a^V3.0336^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa ganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati  ^a^T3.0316^ea^ nahetupaccayaa --  ahetuka.m ganthavippayutta.m...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne (yaava asa~n~nasattaa), cakkhaayatana.m  paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m paccayaa kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, vatthu.m paccayaa  ahetukaa ganthavippayuttaa khandhaa, vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthu~nca  paccayaa vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho (sa.mkhitta.m).
text.2601: [03] 59^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa eka.m, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare tii.ni...pe0...  naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate satta, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme cattaari,  navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte  tii.ni, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
text.2603: [03] 60^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava (eva.m ga.netabba.m).

text.2644: [03] 72^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ganthasampayutte  khandhe aarabbha ganthasampayuttakaa khandhaa uppajjanti ^a^M3.0278^ea^. text.2645: [03] 73^b^.^eb^ ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m  datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m ^a^T3.0321^ea^ katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani  paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati, ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa  magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa,  vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ariyaa ganthavippayutte  pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe  samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti, cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m ganthavippayutte khandhe ca lobha~nca  pa.tigha~nca aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati ^a^V3.0342^ea^, ta.m aarabbha ganthavippayutto  raago uppajjati, vicikicchaa...pe0... uddhacca.m...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati,  dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena  ganthavippayuttacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0...  aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... ganthavippayuttaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa,  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

text.2650: [03] 75^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto ^a^V3.0343^ea^ dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ganthasampayutte khandhe garu.m katvaa ganthasampayuttakaa  khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- ganthasampayuttaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m  adhipatipaccayena paccayo. text.2658: [03] 78^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto ^a^M3.0281^ea^ dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo --  purimaa purimaa ganthasampayuttaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m ganthasampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m  anantarapaccayena paccayo. text.2704: [03] ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammaa ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo --  sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- ganthasampayuttaa  khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ --  di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- domanassasahagataa khandhaa ca pa.tigha~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo; di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca vatthu ca lobhassa atthipaccayena paccayo;  domanassasahagataa khandhaa ca vatthu ca pa.tighassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa  khandhaa ca lobho ca domanassasahagataa khandhaa ca pa.tigha~nca ^a^T3.0336^ea^ purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena  paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- ganthasampayuttaa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa  atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- ganthasampayuttaa khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m  atthipaccayena paccayo. text.2894: [03] 29^b^.^eb^ noniivara.no dhammo noniivara.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m  katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0...  ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m...pe0... phala.m...pe0... nibbaana.m...pe0... nibbaana.m  gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0...  vatthu.m noniivara.ne khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago  uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- noniivara.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m  cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. text.2896: [03] noniivara.no dhammo niivara.nassa ca noniivara.nassa ^a^T3.0358^ea^ ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0...  pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noniivara.ne khandhe garu.m  katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa niivara.naa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti.  ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- noniivara.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m niivara.naana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca  ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

text.3153: [03] anantarapaccayena paccayo (aavajjanaapi vu.t.thaanampi natthi, sabbattha purimaa purimaa kaatabbaa)...  samanantarapaccayena paccayo... nava... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... nava... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena  paccayo... nava... nissayapaccayena paccayo... nava... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... nava (aaramma.nasadisa.m,  vipaako natthi)... aasevanapaccayena paccayo... pa~nca.
text.3155: [03] 104^b^.^eb^ niivara.nasampayutto ^a^M3.0335^ea^ ^a^V3.0413^ea^ ceva no ca niivara.no dhammo niivara.nasampayuttassa ceva  no ca niivara.nassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- niivara.nasampayuttaa ceva no ca niivara.naa cetanaa  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) niivara.nasampayuttaa ceva  no ca niivara.naa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m niivara.naana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m)  niivara.nasampayuttaa ceva no ca niivara.naa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m niivara.naana~nca  kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.3157: [03] 105^b^.^eb^ niivara.nasampayutto ceva no ca niivara.no dhammo niivara.nasampayuttassa ceva no ca niivara.nassa  dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... indriyapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... jhaanapaccayena  paccayo... tii.ni... maggapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... nava...  atthipaccayena paccayo... nava... natthipaccayena paccayo... nava... vigatapaccayena paccayo...  nava... avigatapaccayena paccayo ^a^T3.0390^ea^ ... nava.
text.3160: [03] 106^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate  nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni, aahaare  tii.ni, indriye tii.ni, jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte nava, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa  nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
text.3162: [03] 107^b^.^eb^ niivara.no ^a^V3.0414^ea^ ceva niivara.nasampayutto ca dhammo niivara.nassa ceva niivara.nasampayuttassa ca  dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo  (eva.m navapi tiisu padesu parivattetabbaa).
text.3164: [03] 108^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^M3.0336^ea^ nava, naaaramma.ne nava...pe0... noavigate nava.
text.3166: [03] 109^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare  tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni...pe0... namagge tii.ni, navippayutte tii.ni, nonatthiyaa  tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
text.3168: [03] 110^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava (anulomamaatikaa)...pe0... avigate  nava.
text.3173: [03] 111^b^.^eb^ niivara.navippayutta.m ^a^T3.0391^ea^ ^a^V3.0415^ea^ niivara.niya.m dhamma.m pa.ticca niivara.navippayutto niivara.niyo  dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- niivara.navippayutta.m niivara.niya.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo  khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0...  (sa.mkhitta.m).
text.3182: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ paraamaasa.m ^a^M3.0337^ea^ ^a^V3.0416^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca noparaamaaso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  paraamaasa.m pa.ticca sampayuttakaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. (1)
text.3183: [03] 2^b^.^eb^ noparaamaasa.m dhamma.m pa.ticca noparaamaaso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- noparaamaasa.m  eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0...  (yaava asa~n~nasattaa mahaabhuutaa). (1)
text.3184: [03] noparaamaasa.m dhamma.m pa.ticca paraamaaso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- noparaamaase khandhe  pa.ticca paraamaaso. (2)
text.3185: [03] noparaamaasa.m dhamma.m pa.ticca paraamaaso ca noparaamaaso ^a^T3.0392^ea^ ca dhammaa uppajjanti  hetupaccayaa ^a^V3.0417^ea^ --  noparaamaasa.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa paraamaaso ca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0...  dve khandhe...pe0.... (3)
text.3186: [03] 3^b^.^eb^ paraamaasa~nca noparaamaasa~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca noparaamaaso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  noparaamaasa.m eka.m khandha~nca paraamaasa~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0...  dve khandhe ca...pe0... paraamaase ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (1)
text.3188: [03] 4^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa pa~nca, aaramma.ne pa~nca (sabbattha pa~nca), vipaake eka.m...pe0... avigate  pa~nca.
text.3192: [03] 5^b^.^eb^ noparaamaasa.m ^a^M3.0338^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca noparaamaaso dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa --  ahetuka.m noparaamaasa.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0...  dve khandhe...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (yaava asa~n~nasattaa) vicikicchaasahagate  uddhaccasahagate khandhe pa.ticca vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
text.3194: [03] 6^b^.^eb^ paraamaasa.m ^a^V3.0418^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca noparaamaaso dhammo uppajjati naaaramma.napaccayaa -- paraamaasa.m  pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (1)
text.3195: [03] noparaamaasa.m dhamma.m pa.ticca noparaamaaso dhammo uppajjati naaaramma.napaccayaa -- noparaamaase  khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (yaava asa~n~nasattaa). (1)
text.3196: [03] paraamaasa~nca noparaamaasa~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca noparaamaaso dhammo uppajjati naaaramma.napaccayaa --  paraamaasa~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (1)
text.3199: [03] 7^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^T3.0393^ea^ eka.m, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa pa~nca, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare  tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate pa~nca, napacchaajaate pa~nca,  naaasevane pa~nca, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake pa~nca, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m,  najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte pa~nca, nonatthiyaa tii.ni,  novigate tii.ni.
text.3202: [03] 8^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0339^ea^ naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa pa~nca...pe0... navipaake  pa~nca...pe0... nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte pa~nca, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
text.3205: [03] 9^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V3.0419^ea^ aaramma.ne eka.m, anantare eka.m (sabbattha eka.m), avigate eka.m.
text.3211: [03] 10^b^.^eb^ paraamaasa.m dhamma.m paccayaa noparaamaaso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- paraamaasa.m  paccayaa sampayuttakaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m. (1)
text.3212: [03] noparaamaasa.m dhamma.m paccayaa noparaamaaso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- noparaamaasa.m  eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0...  (yaava ajjhattikaa mahaabhuutaa), vatthu.m paccayaa noparaamaasaa khandhaa. (1)
text.3213: [03] noparaamaasa.m ^a^T3.0394^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa paraamaaso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- noparaamaase khandhe  paccayaa paraamaaso, vatthu.m paccayaa paraamaaso. (2)
text.3214: [03] noparaamaasa.m dhamma.m paccayaa paraamaaso ca noparaamaaso ca dhammaa  uppajjanti hetupaccayaa ^a^V3.0420^ea^ --  noparaamaasa.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa paraamaaso ^a^M3.0340^ea^ ca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca  ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... vatthu.m paccayaa paraamaaso, mahaabhuute paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m  ruupa.m, vatthu.m paccayaa paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa. (3)
text.3215: [03] 11^b^.^eb^ paraamaasa~nca noparaamaasa~nca dhamma.m paccayaa noparaamaaso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  noparaamaasa.m eka.m khandha~nca paraamaasa~nca paccayaa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0...  dve khandhe ca...pe0... paraamaasa~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m,  paraamaasa~nca mahaabhuute ca paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, paraamaasa~nca vatthu~nca paccayaa noparaamaasaa  khandhaa (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)
text.3217: [03] 12^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa pa~nca, aaramma.ne pa~nca, adhipatiyaa pa~nca (sabbattha pa~nca), vipaake eka.m...pe0...  avigate pa~nca.
text.3220: [03] 13^b^.^eb^ noparaamaasa.m dhamma.m paccayaa noparaamaaso dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m  noparaamaasa.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0...  ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (yaava asa~n~nasattaa) cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0...  kaayaayatana.m ^a^T3.0395^ea^ paccayaa kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, vatthu.m paccayaa ahetukaa noparaamaasaa khandhaa;  vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthu~nca paccayaa vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato  moho (sa.mkhitta.m).
text.3223: [03] 14^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^V3.0421^ea^ eka.m, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa pa~nca, naanantare tii.ni...pe0...  naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate pa~nca, napacchaajaate pa~nca ^a^M3.0341^ea^, naaasevane pa~nca,  nakamme tii.ni, navipaake pa~nca, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge  eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte pa~nca, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
text.3225: [03] 15^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa pa~nca (eva.m sabbattha kaatabba.m).
text.3231: [03] paraamaasa.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho noparaamaaso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- paraamaasa.m sa.msa.t.thaa  sampayuttakaa khandhaa (eva.m pa~nca pa~nhaa kaatabbaa aruupeyeva, sa.msa.t.thavaaropi sampayuttavaaropi  eva.m kaatabbaa).
text.3235: [03] 17^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso ^a^T3.0396^ea^ ^a^V3.0422^ea^ dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- noparaamaasaa  hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (1)
text.3236: [03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- noparaamaasaa hetuu paraamaasassa  hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3237: [03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa ca noparaamaasassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- noparaamaasaa  hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m paraamaasassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo.  (3)
text.3239: [03] 18^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso ^a^M3.0342^ea^ dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- paraamaasa.m  aarabbha paraamaaso uppajjati. (muula.m kaatabba.m) paraamaasa.m aarabbha noparaamaasaa khandhaa  uppajjanti. (muula.m kaatabba.m) paraamaasa.m aarabbha paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa  uppajjanti. (3)
text.3240: [03] 19^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0...  siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m  aarabbha raago...pe0... vicikicchaa... uddhacca.m... domanassa.m uppajjati; pubbe  suci.n.naani ^a^V3.0423^ea^ ...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa  magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti. nibbaana.m gotrabhussa,  vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena ^a^T3.0397^ea^ paccayo; ariyaa noparaamaase  pahiine kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0...  vatthu.m noparaamaase khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m  aarabbha raago...pe0... vicikicchaa... uddhacca.m... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena  cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. cetopariya~naa.nena noparaamaasacittasama"ngissa  citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m  nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m  kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... noparaamaasaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa,  pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3241: [03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0...  uposathakamma.m...pe0... ta.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha di.t.thi uppajjati, pubbe...pe0...  jhaanaa...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noparaamaase khandhe assaadeti abhinandati,  ta.m aarabbha di.t.thi uppajjati. (2)
text.3242: [03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa ca noparaamaasassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo --  daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... ta.m assaadeti abhinandati,  ta.m aarabbha paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti, pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa  ^a^M3.0343^ea^...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noparaamaase khandhe assaadeti abhinandati,  ta.m aarabbha paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)
text.3243: [03] 20^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso ca noparaamaaso ca dhammaa paraamaasassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo --  paraamaasa~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe aarabbha paraamaaso uppajjati... tii.ni.
text.3245: [03] 21^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso ^a^V3.0424^ea^ dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- paraamaasa.m garu.m  katvaa paraamaaso uppajjati... tii.ni (aaramma.naadhipatiyeva kaatabbaa).
text.3246: [03] 22^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati,  sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0...  ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago  uppajjati, pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m  katvaa...pe0... phala.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa...pe0...  nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0...  vatthu.m noparaamaase khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa  raago uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- noparaamaasaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m  cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3247: [03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati.  ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... pubbe...pe0...  jhaanaa...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noparaamaase khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti  abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- noparaamaasaadhipati  paraamaasassa adhipatipaccayena ^a^T3.0399^ea^ paccayo. (2)
text.3248: [03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa ca noparaamaasassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo --  aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0...  uposathakamma.m...pe0... pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa ^a^M3.0344^ea^...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0...  vatthu.m noparaamaase khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa paraamaaso  ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- noparaamaasaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m paraamaasassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.3249: [03] paraamaaso ^a^V3.0425^ea^ ca noparaamaaso ca dhammaa paraamaasassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ --  paraamaasa~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe garu.m katvaa paraamaaso... tii.ni.
text.3251: [03] 23^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimo purimo paraamaaso  pacchimassa pacchimassa paraamaasassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) purimo purimo  paraamaaso pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m noparaamaasaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; paraamaaso  vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) purimo purimo paraamaaso pacchimassa  pacchimassa paraamaasassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.3252: [03] 24^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa  noparaamaasaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m ^a^T3.0400^ea^ pacchimaana.m noparaamaasaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo...pe0...  anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) purimaa purimaa  noparaamaasaa khandhaa pacchimassa pacchimassa paraamaasassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; aavajjanaa paraamaasassa  anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) purimaa purimaa noparaamaasaa khandhaa pacchimassa  pacchimassa paraamaasassa ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; aavajjanaa  paraamaasassa ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.3253: [03] 25^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso ca noparaamaaso ca dhammaa paraamaasassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo --  purimo purimo paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa pacchimassa pacchimassa paraamaasassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) ^a^M3.0345^ea^ purimo purimo paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa  ca khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m noparaamaasaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; paraamaaso  ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) purimo  purimo paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa pacchimassa pacchimassa paraamaasassa sampayuttakaana~nca  khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.3255: [03] 26^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso ^a^V3.0426^ea^ dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...  a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... nissayapaccayena paccayo... pa~nca.
text.3257: [03] 27^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena  ^a^T3.0401^ea^ paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- paraamaaso paraamaasassa  upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.3258: [03] 28^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m  deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti... maana.m jappeti... siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m...  raaga.m... dosa.m... moha.m... maana.m... patthana.m... kaayika.m sukha.m...pe0... senaasana.m  upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti... paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m  bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m, saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya...  kaayikassa sukhassa...pe0... maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.3259: [03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya  di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati, siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m, raaga.m...pe0... patthana.m, kaayika.m sukha.m...pe0...  senaasana.m upanissaaya di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m paraamaasassa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.3260: [03] noparaamaaso ^a^M3.0346^ea^ dhammo paraamaasassa ca noparaamaasassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo --  saddha.m upanissaaya di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati, siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya di.t.thi.m  ^a^T3.0402^ea^ ^a^V3.0427^ea^ ga.nhaati; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m paraamaasassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. (3)
text.3261: [03] 29^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso ca noparaamaaso ca dhammaa paraamaasassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo --  tii.ni upanissayaa paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa paraamaasassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo...  tii.ni.
text.3263: [03] 30^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0...  vipassati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago...pe0... vicikicchaa...pe0...  uddhacca.m...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya  sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0....  ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  vatthu noparaamaasaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3264: [03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti abhinandati,  ta.m aarabbha di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu paraamaasassa purejaatapaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.3265: [03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa ca noparaamaasassa ca dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo --  aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m  assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha paraamaaso ^a^T3.0403^ea^ ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti.  ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu paraamaasassa ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena  paccayo. (3)
text.3267: [03] 31^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso ^a^M3.0347^ea^ dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo...  tii.ni (pacchaajaataa kaatabbaa)... aasevanapaccayena paccayo... nava.
text.3269: [03] 32^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso ^a^V3.0428^ea^ dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa.  ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- noparaamaasaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m  kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- noparaamaasaa cetanaa  vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) noparaamaasaa  cetanaa paraamaasassa kammapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) noparaamaasaa cetanaa paraamaasassa  ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.3271: [03] 33^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo... eka.m...  aahaarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni, indriyapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... jhaanapaccayena paccayo...  tii.ni.
text.3272: [03] paraamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa maggapaccayena paccayo -- paraamaasaani magga"ngaani...pe0...  (eva.m pa~nca pa~nhaa kaatabbaa) sampayuttapaccayena ^a^T3.0404^ea^ paccayo... pa~nca.
text.3274: [03] 34^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m  (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)
text.3275: [03] noparaamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m,  pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)
text.3276: [03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu  paraamaasassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3277: [03] noparaamaaso ^a^M3.0348^ea^ ^a^V3.0429^ea^ dhammo paraamaasassa ca noparaamaasassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena  paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu paraamaasassa ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena  paccayo. (3)
text.3278: [03] paraamaaso ca noparaamaaso ca dhammaa noparaamaasassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo --  sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)
text.3280: [03] 35^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m.  ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- paraamaaso sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaato^eb^ -- paraamaaso purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.3281: [03] 36^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m,  pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)
text.3282: [03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m.  ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ ^a^T3.0405^ea^ -- noparaamaasaa khandhaa paraamaasassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ --  cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha di.t.thi uppajjati, vatthu  paraamaasassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3283: [03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa ca noparaamaasassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m,  purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- noparaamaaso eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m paraamaasassa ca  cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0.... ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0...  vatthu.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti,  vatthu paraamaasassa ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.3284: [03] 37^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso ^a^V3.0430^ea^ ca noparaamaaso ca dhammaa noparaamaasassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo --  sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m ^a^M3.0349^ea^, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- noparaamaaso  eko khandho ca paraamaaso ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m  ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; paraamaaso ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo; ^b^paraamaaso ca vatthu ca^eb^ noparaamaasaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaato^eb^ --  paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo.  ^b^pacchaajaato^eb^ -- paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca ^a^T3.0406^ea^ khandhaa kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa  atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaato^eb^ -- paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa ruupajiivitindriya~nca  ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3287: [03] 38^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate  pa~nca, a~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, nissaye pa~nca, upanissaye nava, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate  tii.ni, aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni, vipaake eka.m, aahaare tii.ni, indriye tii.ni,  jhaane tii.ni, magge pa~nca, sampayutte pa~nca, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa pa~nca, natthiyaa  nava, vigate nava, avigate pa~nca.
text.3290: [03] 39^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso ^a^V3.0431^ea^ dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.3291: [03] paraamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...  upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3292: [03] paraamaaso ^a^M3.0350^ea^ dhammo paraamaasassa ca noparaamaasassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo...  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.3293: [03] 40^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena  paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo ^a^T3.0407^ea^... indriyapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.3294: [03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...  upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)

text.3297: [03] paraamaaso ca noparaamaaso ca dhammaa noparaamaasassa dhammassa  aaramma.napaccayena paccayo ^a^V3.0432^ea^...  sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3298: [03] paraamaaso ca noparaamaaso ca dhammaa paraamaasassa ca noparaamaasassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.3300: [03] 42^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa nava, naaaramma.ne nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
text.3302: [03] 43^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0351^ea^ naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, naanantare tii.ni,  nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, naupanissaye tii.ni...pe0... namagge tii.ni, nasampayutte  eka.m, navippayutte tii.ni, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.

text.3317: [03] 46^b^.^eb^ paraamaasasampayutta.m ^a^V3.0434^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca paraamaasasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  paraamaasasampayutta.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0....  (1)

text.3360: [03] 58^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa eka.m, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare  tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate cattaari, napacchaajaate nava,  naaasevane nava, nakamme cattaari, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m,  najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte ^a^T3.0413^ea^ dve, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate  tii.ni.

text.3424: [03] 79^b^.^eb^ paraamaasasampayutto ^a^M3.0364^ea^ ca paraamaasavippayutto ca dhammaa paraamaasasampayuttassa  dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- paraamaasasampayutto  eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa  ca...pe0.... text.3617: [03] anaaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ --  pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu saaramma.naana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0...  vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya  sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu  saaramma.naana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3618: [03] 43^b^.^eb^ saaramma.no ca anaaramma.no ca dhammaa saaramma.nassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m,  purejaata.m. sahajaato^eb^ -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhaayatana~nca ti.n.nanna.m  khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagato  eko khandho ca kaayaayatana~nca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve  khandhaa ca...pe0... saaramma.no eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
text.3619: [01] saaramma.no ^a^M3.0383^ea^ ca anaaramma.no ca dhammaa anaaramma.nassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo --  sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- saaramma.naa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa  ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ --  saaramma.naa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena  paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ ^a^V3.0472^ea^ --  saaramma.naa ^a^T4.0017^ea^ khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.3622: [03] 44^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare eka.m, samanantare  eka.m, sahajaate satta, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejaate eka.m,  pacchaajaate eka.m, aasevane eka.m, kamme tii.ni, vipaake tii.ni, aahaare cattaari,  indriye cha, jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte dve, atthiyaa satta,  natthiyaa eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate satta.
text.3624: [03] 45^b^.^eb^ saaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...  upanissayapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.3625: [03] saaramma.no dhammo anaaramma.nassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo...  kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

text.4097: [03] cittasampayutto ^a^V3.0536^ea^ dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo --  sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cittasampayuttaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m  cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ --  cittasampayuttaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo.  (3)
text.4099: [03] 173^b^.^eb^ cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

text.4117: [03] 178^b^.^eb^ cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammaa cittasampayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena  paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagato eko khandho ca  cakkhaayatana~nca dvinna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagato eko khandho ca kaayaayatana~nca  dvinna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... cittasampayutto eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinna.m khandhaana.m...pe0...  dve khandhaa ca...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... text.4118: [03] cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammaa cittavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo --  sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cittasampayuttaa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa  ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena ^a^T4.0081^ea^ paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ --  cittasampayuttakaa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo.  ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- cittasampayuttakaa khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.4121: [03] 179^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^M3.0437^ea^ tii.ni, aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare eka.m,  samanantare eka.m, sahajaate satta, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejaate  eka.m, pacchaajaate eka.m, aasevane eka.m, kamme tii.ni, vipaake tii.ni, aahaare cattaari,  indriye cha ^a^V3.0539^ea^, jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte dve, atthiyaa satta,  natthiyaa eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate satta.

text.4378: [03] cittasahabhu~nca nocittasahabhu~nca dhamma.m paccayaa cittasahabhuu ca nocittasahabhuu ca dhammaa uppajjanti  hetupaccayaa -- cittasahabhu.m eka.m khandha~nca citta~nca paccayaa ^a^M3.0466^ea^ dve khandhaa  cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, cittasahabhu.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca  paccayaa dve khandhaa citta~nca, dve ^a^T4.0118^ea^ khandhe ca...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (pa.ticcasadisa.m,  sabbe mahaabhuutaa). (3)
text.4380: [03] 249^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhu.m dhamma.m paccayaa cittasahabhuu dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa... tii.ni  (pa.ticcasadisa.m).
text.4381: [03] nocittasahabhu.m dhamma.m paccayaa nocittasahabhuu dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa...pe0... cakkhaayatana.m  paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m...pe0.... (ima.m cittasamu.t.thaanaduka.m  paccayavaare aaramma.nasadisa.m. channampi imesa.m pa~ncavi~n~naa.namuulaa kaatabbaa. sa.mkhitta.m.)
text.4383: [03] 250^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^V3.0575^ea^ nava, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
text.4386: [03] 251^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhu.m dhamma.m paccayaa cittasahabhuu dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m  cittasahabhu.m eka.m khandha.m...pe0.... (sa.mkhitta.m. sabba.m kaatabba.m. paccayavaarassa pa~ncavi~n~naa.na.m  channampi muulaa kaatabbaa. sabbe mahaabhuute tii.niyeva moho. sa.mkhitta.m.)
text.4389: [03] 252^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa nava, naaaramma.ne nava, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava,  naa~n~nama~n~ne nava, naupanissaye nava, napurejaate nava ^a^M3.0467^ea^, napacchaajaate nava,  naaasevane nava, nakamme cattaari, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m,  najhaane nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyaa nava, novigate  nava.
text.4391: [03] 253^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^V3.0576^ea^ naaaramma.ne nava (sabbattha nava), nakamme tii.ni  ^a^T4.0119^ea^, navipaake nava, nasampayutte  nava, navippayutte pa~nca, nonatthiyaa nava, novigate nava.
text.4393: [03] 254^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne nava, anantare nava (sabbattha nava), magge tii.ni...pe0...  avigate nava.

(1)
text.4438: [03] nocittasahabhuu dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m.  ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- citta.m cittasahabhuuna.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.  ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo...pe0...  kaayaayatana.m...pe0... vatthu cittasahabhuuna.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. text.4455: [03] 270^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate  nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye ^a^T4.0127^ea^ nava, upanissaye nava, purejaate  tii.ni, pacchaajaate ^a^V3.0584^ea^ tii.ni,  aasevane nava, kamme ^a^M3.0474^ea^ tii.ni, vipaake nava, aahaare nava, indriye nava,  jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte pa~nca, vippayutte nava, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa nava,  vigate nava, avigate nava.

text.4537: [03] 293^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
text.4539: [03] 294^b^.^eb^ cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaana.m ^a^M3.0483^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano dhammo uppajjati  nahetupaccayaa (eva.m nava pa~nhaa kaatabbaa. paccayavaare pa~ncavi~n~naa.nampi kaatabba.m, tii.niyeva  moho).
text.4542: [03] 295^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa nava, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare  tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate nava,  napacchaajaate nava ^a^V3.0596^ea^, naaasevane  nava, nakamme cattaari, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane nava,  namagge nava, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
text.4548: [03] 296^b^.^eb^ cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaana.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaana.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa ^a^T4.0139^ea^ dve khandhaa, dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (1)
text.4549: [03] cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaana.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaane khandhe sa.msa.t.tha.m citta.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)

(3)
text.4551: [03] nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaana.m ^a^M3.0484^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano dhammo uppajjati  hetupaccayaa -- citta.m sa.msa.t.thaa sampayuttakaa khandhaa; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
