text.4559: [03] 299^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa pa~nca, naadhipatiyaa pa~nca, napurejaate pa~nca, napacchaajaate pa~nca, naaasevane  pa~nca, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake pa~nca, najhaane pa~nca, namagge pa~nca, navippayutte pa~nca.

text.4567: [03] 301^b^.^eb^ cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano dhammo cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo --  cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaane khandhe aarabbha cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa khandhaa uppajjanti. text.4568: [03] nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano dhammo nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo --  ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti...pe0... nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti. nibbaana.m  gotrabhussa...pe0.... text.4571: [03] nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano dhammo nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo --  aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati... tii.ni (dvepi adhipati kaatabbaa). (3)
text.4572: [03] cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano ca nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano ca dhammaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena  paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati. text.4574: [03] 303^b^.^eb^ cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano ^a^M3.0486^ea^ dhammo cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena  paccayo (navapi pa~nhaa cittasahabhuudukasadisaa)... samanantarapaccayena paccayo... nava... sahajaatapaccayena  paccayo... nava (pa.ticcasadisaa)... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... nava (pa.ticcasadisaa)...  nissayapaccayena paccayo... nava (paccayasadisaa)... upanissayapaccayena paccayo (navapi pa~nhaa  cittasahabhuudukasadisaa, ninnaanaakara.na.m).
text.4576: [03] 304^b^.^eb^ nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano dhammo nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo --  aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m... tii.ni (cittasahabhuudukasadisaa, ninnaanaakara.na.m).
text.4577: [03] cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano dhammo nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo  (cittasahabhuudukasadisaa ^a^V3.0600^ea^, ninnaanaakara.na.m. tii.nipi pacchaajaataa. dve. ekamuulaana.m ekaa  gha.tanaa)... aasevanapaccayena paccayo... nava.
text.4579: [03] 305^b^.^eb^ cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano ^a^T4.0142^ea^ dhammo cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo...  tii.ni (cittasahabhuudukasadisaa ninnaanaakara.naa. tii.nipi sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa)...  vipaakapaccayena paccayo... nava... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... nava (cittasahabhuugamanasadisaa,  eka.myeva kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m)... indriyapaccayena paccayo... nava... jhaanapaccayena  paccayo... tii.ni... maggapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... pa~nca.
text.4581: [03] 306^b^.^eb^ cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano dhammo nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena  paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)
text.4582: [03] nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano ^a^M3.0487^ea^ dhammo nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena  paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)
text.4583: [03] nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano dhammo cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo --  sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaana.m khandhaana.m  vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m  vippayuttapaccayena paccayo...pe0... kaayaayatana.m...pe0... vatthu cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaana.m  khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.4584: [03] nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano dhammo cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa ca nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa ca dhammassa  vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu  cittassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena ^a^T4.0143^ea^ paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m  cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa ^a^V3.0601^ea^ sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo...pe0... kaayaayatana.m...pe0...  vatthu cittassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)

text.4587: [03] 307^b^.^eb^ cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano dhammo cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo  (pa.ticcasadisaa). cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano dhammo nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena  paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano dhammo cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa  ca nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo (pa.ticcasadisaa). text.4588: [03] nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano dhammo nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m,  purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m (purejaatasadisa.m purejaata.m kaatabba.m.  sabba.m sa.mkhitta.m. vitthaaretabba.m). (1)
text.4589: [03] nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano ^a^M3.0488^ea^ dhammo cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena  paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- citta.m sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne citta.m sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo, pa.tisandhikkha.ne  vatthu cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ (purejaatasadisa.m,  ninnaanaakara.na.m). text.4590: [03] nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano dhammo cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa ca nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa ca dhammassa  atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- citta.m sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne citta.m sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo, pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu cittassa sampayuttakaana~nca  khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ ^a^T4.0144^ea^ (purejaatasadisa.m). (3)
text.4591: [03] 308^b^.^eb^ cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano ^a^V3.0602^ea^ ca nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano ca dhammaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa  atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. sahajaato^eb^ -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagato eko  khandho ca cakkhuvi~n~naa.na~nca dvinna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagato  eko khandho ca cakkhaayatana~nca dvinna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagato...pe0...  cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano eko khandho ca citta~nca dvinna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo,  dve khandhaa ca...pe0... cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinna.m khandhaana.m  atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... (pa.tisandhikkha.ne dvepi kaatabbaa).  (1)
text.4592: [03] cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano ca nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano ca dhammaa nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena  paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataa  khandhaa ca cakkhaayatana~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagataa...pe0...  cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa khandhaa ^a^T4.0145^ea^ ca citta~nca cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo,  cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena  paccayo, cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa khandhaa ca vatthu ca cittassa atthipaccayena paccayo (pa.tisandhikkha.ne  ^a^M3.0489^ea^ tii.ni kaatabbaa). ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa khandhaa ca citta~nca  purejaatassa imassa nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ --  cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa khandhaa ca citta~nca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa  kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa khandhaa ca citta~nca  ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.4593: [03] cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano ca nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano ca dhammaa cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa ca nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa  ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagato  eko khandho ca cakkhaayatana~nca dvinna.m khandhaana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo,  dve khandhaa ca...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagato...pe0.... ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano  eko khandho ca citta~nca dvinna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo,  dve khandhaa ca...pe0... cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinna.m ^a^V3.0603^ea^ khandhaana.m  cittassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo, dve khandhaa ca...pe0... text.4684: [03] baahira.m dhamma.m paccayaa baahiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- baahira.m eka.m khandha.m  paccayaa dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe...pe0... (pa.tisandhikkha.ne dvepi kaatabbaa,  yaava ajjhattikaa mahaabhuutaa) vatthu.m paccayaa ^a^T4.0157^ea^ baahiraa khandhaa. baahira.m dhamma.m paccayaa  ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- baahire khandhe paccayaa citta.m, vatthu.m paccayaa  citta.m (pa.tisandhikkha.ne dvepi kaatabbaa). baahira.m dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko ca baahiro  ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- baahira.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa dve khandhaa citta~nca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca  ruupa.m, dve khandhe...pe0... vatthu.m paccayaa citta.m sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa (pa.tisandhikkha.ne  dvepi kaatabbaa). (3)
text.4685: [03] 333^b^.^eb^ ajjhattika~nca ^a^V3.0616^ea^ baahira~nca dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  pa.tisandhikkha.ne citta~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayaa ajjhattika.m ka.tattaaruupa.m. ajjhattika~nca  baahira~nca dhamma.m paccayaa baahiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- baahira.m eka.m  khandha~nca citta~nca paccayaa dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe...pe0... citta~nca  mahaabhuute ca paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, citta~nca vatthu~nca paccayaa baahiraa khandhaa (pa.tisandhikkha.ne  tii.nipi kaatabbaa). ajjhattika~nca baahira~nca dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko ca baahiro  ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne baahira.m eka.m khandha~nca citta~nca paccayaa  dve khandhaa ajjhattika~nca baahira~nca ka.tattaaruupa.m, dve khandhe...pe0.... (3)
text.4687: [03] 334^b^.^eb^ ajjhattika.m dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- cakkhaayatana.m  paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m ^a^T4.0158^ea^ ...pe0.... ajjhattika.m dhamma.m paccayaa  baahiro dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- cakkhaayatana~nca ^a^M3.0499^ea^ cakkhuvi~n~naa.na~nca  paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataa khandhaa...pe0... kaayaayatana~nca...pe0... citta.m paccayaa  sampayuttakaa khandhaa; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ajjhattika.m dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko  ca baahiro ca dhammaa uppajjanti aaramma.napaccayaa -- cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m sampayuttakaa  ca khandhaa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m...pe0.... (3)
text.4688: [03] baahira.m dhamma.m paccayaa baahiro dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- baahira.m eka.m khandha.m  paccayaa dve khandhaa, dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... vatthu.m paccayaa baahiraa  khandhaa. baahira.m dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- baahire  khandhe paccayaa citta.m, vatthu.m paccayaa citta.m (pa.tisandhikkha.ne dvepi kaatabbaa). baahira.m  dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa uppajjanti aaramma.napaccayaa -- vatthu.m paccayaa  citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa (pa.tisandhikkha.ne eka.m kaatabba.m). (3)
text.4689: [03] 335^b^.^eb^ ajjhattika~nca baahira~nca dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko dhammo  uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa ^a^V3.0617^ea^ --  cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagate khandhe ca cakkhaayatana~nca paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagate...pe0....
text.4690: [03] ajjhattika~nca baahira~nca dhamma.m paccayaa baahiro dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagata.m  eka.m khandha~nca cakkhaayatana~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.na~nca paccayaa dve khandhaa, dve khandhe...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagata.m...pe0...  baahira.m ^a^T4.0159^ea^ eka.m khandha~nca citta~nca paccayaa dve khandhaa, dve khandhe...pe0... citta~nca  vatthu~nca paccayaa baahiraa khandhaa (pa.tisandhikkha.ne dvepi kaatabbaa). ajjhattika~nca baahira~nca  dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa uppajjanti aaramma.napaccayaa -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagata.m  eka.m khandha~nca cakkhaayatana~nca paccayaa dve khandhaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na~nca, dve khandhe...pe0... (sa.mkhitta.m).  (3)
text.4692: [03] 336^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa pa~nca, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate  nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejaate nava, aasevane nava, kamme  nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
text.4695: [03] 337^b^.^eb^ ajjhattika.m ^a^M3.0500^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa --  ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne citta.m paccayaa ajjhattika.m ka.tattaaruupa.m, cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa  cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m. (sa.mkhitta.m. eva.m navapi pa~nhaa kaatabbaa. pa~ncavi~n~naa.nampi pavesetvaa  tii.niyeva moho.)
text.4698: [03] 338^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^V3.0618^ea^ nava, naaaramma.ne nava, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava,  naa~n~nama~n~ne nava, naupanissaye nava, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava,  nakamme tii.ni, navipaake pa~nca, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane nava, namagge  nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte pa~nca, nonatthiyaa ^a^T4.0160^ea^ nava, novigate nava.
text.4703: [03] 339^b^.^eb^ ajjhattika.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho baahiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- citta.m sa.msa.t.thaa  sampayuttakaa khandhaa; pa.tisandhikkha.ne citta.m sa.msa.t.thaa sampayuttakaa khandhaa. (1)
text.4704: [03] baahira.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho baahiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- baahira.m eka.m khandha.m  sa.msa.t.thaa dve khandhaa, dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... baahira.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho  ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- baahire khandhe sa.msa.t.tha.m citta.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  baahira.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- baahira.m  eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa dve khandhaa citta~nca, dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....  (3)
text.4705: [03] ajjhattika~nca ^a^M3.0501^ea^ ^a^V3.0619^ea^ baahira~nca dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho baahiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa --  baahira.m eka.m khandha~nca citta~nca sa.msa.t.thaa dve khandhaa, dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0...  (sa.mkhitta.m). hetuyaa pa~nca, aaramma.ne pa~nca, adhipatiyaa pa~nca (sabbattha pa~nca), avigate  pa~nca (anuloma.m).
text.4706: [03] ajjhattika.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho baahiro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa (eva.m pa~nca kaatabbaa,  tii.niyeva moho).
text.4707: [03] nahetuyaa ^a^T4.0169^ea^ pa~nca, naadhipatiyaa pa~nca, napurejaate pa~nca, napacchaajaate pa~nca, naaasevane pa~nca,  nakamme tii.ni, navipaake pa~nca, najhaane pa~nca, namagge pa~nca, navippayutte pa~nca (paccaniiya.m).
text.4713: [03] 340^b^.^eb^ baahiro dhammo baahirassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- baahiraa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m  khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne baahiraa  hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m baahiraana~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.4714: [03] baahiro ^a^V3.0620^ea^ dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- baahiraa hetuu cittassa hetupaccayena  paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne baahiraa hetuu cittassa ajjhattikaana~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m hetupaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.4715: [03] baahiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca baahirassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- baahiraa hetuu  sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo;  pa.tisandhikkha.ne baahiraa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittassa ca ajjhattikaana~nca baahiraana~nca  ka.tattaaruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.4717: [03] 341^b^.^eb^ ajjhattiko ^a^M3.0502^ea^ dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo --  citta.m aarabbha citta.m uppajjati. (muula.m pucchitabba.m) citta.m ^a^T4.0162^ea^ aarabbha baahiraa khandhaa  uppajjanti. (muula.m pucchitabba.m) citta.m aarabbha citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti.  (3)
text.4718: [03] baahiro dhammo baahirassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0...  uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati; pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m...pe0...  ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m...pe0... phala.m...pe0... nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti...  nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo.  ariyaa baahire pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese...pe0...  pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti, ruupe...pe0... vatthu.m baahire khandhe aniccato...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati.  cetopariya~naa.nena baahiracittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0...  aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m  khandhaana.m aaramma.napaccayena paccayo...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m...pe0... baahiraa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa,  cetopariya~naa.nassa ^a^V3.0621^ea^, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa,  aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
text.4719: [03] baahiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0...  uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati assaadeti ^a^T4.0163^ea^ abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha citta.m uppajjati.  pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaana.m...pe0... (sa.mkhitta.m, sabba.m kaatabba.m) pubbe  samudaaci.n.ne...pe0... ruupe...pe0... vatthu.m baahire khandhe aniccato...pe0...  vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha citta.m uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa  ruupa.m passati...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m...pe0...  baahiraa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa,  yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.4720: [03] baahiro ^a^M3.0503^ea^ dhammo ajjhattikassa ca baahirassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo --  daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati assaadeti  abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti (sa.mkhitta.m, sabba.m  kaatabba.m). baahire khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati,  ta.m aarabbha citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati...pe0...  ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m...pe0...  baahiraa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa,  yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.4721: [01] ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa ajjhattikassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.4723: [03] 342^b^.^eb^ ajjhattiko ^a^T4.0164^ea^ dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ --  citta.m garu.m katvaa citta.m uppajjati. (1)
text.4724: [03] ajjhattiko ^a^V3.0622^ea^ dhammo baahirassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati.  ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- citta.m garu.m katvaa baahiraa khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  cittaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo.  (muula.m) ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ajjhattika.m citta.m garu.m katvaa citta~nca sampayuttakaa  ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)
text.4725: [03] baahiro dhammo baahirassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati.  aaramma.naadhipati -- daana.m datvaa...pe0... tii.ni (dve adhipatii ti.n.nampi kaatabbaa).  (3)
text.4726: [03] ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa ajjhattikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo... tii.ni  (ti.n.nampi ekaayeva adhipati).
text.4728: [03] 343^b^.^eb^ ajjhattiko ^a^M3.0504^ea^ dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo --  purima.m purima.m citta.m pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.4729: [03] baahiro dhammo baahirassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa baahiraa khandhaa  pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa...pe0...  tii.ni (ti.n.nampi ekasadisaa).
text.4730: [03] ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa ajjhattikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni  ^a^T4.0165^ea^, samanantarapaccayena paccayo... nava, sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... nava (pa.ticcasadisaa),   a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... pa~nca (pa.ticcasadisaa), nissayapaccayena paccayo... nava, (paccayavaarasadisaa).
text.4732: [03] 344^b^.^eb^ ajjhattiko ^a^V3.0623^ea^ dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo,  anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- citta.m cittassa  upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.4733: [03] baahiro dhammo baahirassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo,  pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0...  maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0...  sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena  paccayo, (tii.nipi puuretvaa kaatabbaa, cittassaati kaatabbaa, sampayuttakaana~ncaati  kaatabbaa).
text.4734: [01] ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa ajjhattikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
text.4736: [03] 345^b^.^eb^ ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m ^a^M3.0505^ea^...pe0... kaaya.m  aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha citta.m uppajjati.  ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa  purejaatapaccayena paccayo ^a^T4.0166^ea^. (1)
text.4737: [03] ajjhattiko dhammo baahirassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m.  ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... kaaya.m aniccato...pe0... vipassati,  assaadeti...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m  khandhaana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo.  (2)
text.4738: [03] ajjhattiko ^a^V3.0624^ea^ dhammo ajjhattikassa ca baahirassa ca dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... kaaya.m aniccato...pe0...  vipassati, ta.m aarabbha citta~nca sampayuttakaa khandhaa ca uppajjanti. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ --  cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa  sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.4739: [03] 346^b^.^eb^ baahiro dhammo baahirassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m,  vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- ruupe...pe0... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0...  domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m  su.naati. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu baahiraana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.4740: [03] baahiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m.  ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- ruupe...pe0... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0...  ta.m aarabbha citta.m uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa  sadda.m su.naati. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu cittassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
text.4741: [03] baahiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca baahirassa ^a^T4.0167^ea^ ca dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo --   aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- ruupe...pe0... pho.t.thabbe... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0...  ta.m aarabbha citta~nca sampayuttakaa khandhaa ca uppajjanti. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati,  dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m ^a^M3.0506^ea^ su.naati. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu cittassa  sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (3)
text.4742: [03] 347^b^.^eb^ ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa ajjhattikassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo --  ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m^eb^. cakkhaayatana~nca vatthu ca cittassa...pe0...  kaayaayatana~nca vatthu ca cittassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo; ruupaayatana~nca cakkhaayatana~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0...  pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca kaayaayatana~nca kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. text.4985: [03] 408^b^.^eb^ noupaadaa dhammo noupaadaa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m,  pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- noupaadaa eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m noupaadaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m  ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0...  eka.m mahaabhuuta.m ti.n.nanna.m mahaabhuutaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo ...pe0... dve mahaabhuutaa  dvinna.m mahaabhuutaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo (yaava asa~n~nasattaa). ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- pho.t.thabbe  aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena  paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa noupaadaa kaayassa atthipaccayena  paccayo. text.4990: [03] upaadaa ca noupaadaa ca dhammaa upaadaa dhammassa ca noupaadaa dhammassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo --  pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro  aahaaro ca imassa upaadaa kaayassa ca noupaadaa kaayassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^  ^a^M3.0535^ea^ -- noupaadaa khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca upaadaa ca noupaadaa ca ka.tattaaruupaana.m  atthipaccayena paccayo. text.5201: [03] anupaadinno dhammo upaadinnassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m,  aahaara.m. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- anupaadinne ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe  aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati ^a^T4.0230^ea^; kusalaakusale niruddhe vipaako tadaaramma.nataa  uppajjati, anupaadinna.m ruupaayatana.m ^a^M3.0557^ea^ cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m  kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anupaadinnaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa upaadinnassa  kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; anupaadinno ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa upaadinnassa  kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. text.5565: [03] (yathaa upaadaanaduka.m eva.m pa.ticcavaaropi sahajaatavaaropi paccayavaaropi nissayavaaropi sa.msa.t.thavaaropi  sampayuttavaaropi kaatabbaa, ninnaanaakara.naa, aamasana.m naanaakara.na.m.)
text.5569: [03] 98^b^.^eb^ upaadaano ^a^T4.0282^ea^ ^a^V3.0735^ea^ ceva upaadaaniyo ca dhammo upaadaanassa ceva   upaadaaniyassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena  paccayo -- upaadaanaa ceva upaadaaniyaa ca hetuu sampayuttakaana.m upaadaanaana.m hetupaccayena  paccayo. (1)
text.5570: [03] upaadaano ceva upaadaaniyo ca dhammo upaadaaniyassa ceva no ca upaadaanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena  paccayo -- upaadaanaa ceva upaadaaniyaa ca hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca  ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo (upaadaanadukasadisaa ninnaanaa, nava pa~nhaa).
text.5572: [03] 99^b^.^eb^ upaadaano ^a^M3.0599^ea^ ceva upaadaaniyo ca dhammo upaadaanassa ceva upaadaaniyassa  ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- upaadaane aarabbha upaadaanaa uppajjanti... tii.ni.
text.5573: [03] upaadaaniyo ceva no ca upaadaano dhammo upaadaaniyassa ceva no ca upaadaanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati, assaadeti abhinandati,  ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, vicikicchaa uddhacca.m domanassa.m uppajjati;  ariyaa gotrabhu.m paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m paccavekkhanti, pahiine kilese...pe0...  vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe samudaaci.n.ne...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m...pe0... text.5574: [03] upaadaaniyo ^a^V3.0736^ea^ ceva no ca upaadaano dhammo upaadaanassa ceva upaadaaniyassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena  paccayo (sa.mkhitta.m, itare dve upaadaanadukasadisaa). (3)
text.5575: [03] upaadaano ^a^T4.0283^ea^ ceva upaadaaniyo ca upaadaaniyo ceva no ca upaadaano ca dhammaa upaadaanassa ceva  upaadaaniyassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... tii.ni (he.t.thaa adhipati tii.ni, upaadaanadukasadisaa).
text.5577: [03] 100^b^.^eb^ upaadaaniyo ceva no ca upaadaano dhammo upaadaaniyassa ceva no ca upaadaanassa ca  dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ --  daana.m...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, assaadeti  abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati; sekkhaa gotrabhu.m garu.m  katvaa...pe0... vodaana.m...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m upaadaaniye ceva no ca  upaadaane khandhe garu.m katvaa upaadaaniyaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ --  upaadaaniyaa ceva no ca upaadaanaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca  ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo (avasesaa dvepi aaramma.naadhipati sahajaataadhipatipi upaadaanadukasadisaa).  (3)
text.5578: [03] (gha.tanaa ^a^M3.0600^ea^ adhipati tii.ni, upaadaanadukasadisaa. sabbe paccayaa upaadaanadukasadisaa.  upaadaaniye lokuttara.m natthi, paccaniiyampi itare dve ga.nanaapi upaadaanadukasadisa.m.)
text.5584: [03] 101^b^.^eb^ upaadaana~nceva ^a^T4.0284^ea^ ^a^V3.0737^ea^ upaadaanasampayutta~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca upaadaano ceva upaadaanasampayutto  ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- di.t.thupaadaana.m pa.ticca kaamupaadaana.m (cakka.m kaatabba.m).  (1)
text.5585: [03] upaadaana~nceva upaadaanasampayutta~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca upaadaanasampayutto ceva no ca upaadaano  dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- upaadaane pa.ticca sampayuttakaa khandhaa. (2)
text.5586: [03] upaadaana~nceva upaadaanasampayutta~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca upaadaano ceva upaadaanasampayutto ca upaadaanasampayutto  ceva no ca upaadaano ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- di.t.thupaadaana.m pa.ticca kaamupaadaana.m  sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa (cakka.m). (3)

text.5596: [03] 105^b^.^eb^ upaadaano ^a^V3.0739^ea^ ceva upaadaanasampayutto ca dhammo upaadaanassa ceva   ^a^T4.0286^ea^ upaadaanasampayuttassa  ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- upaadaane aarabbha upaadaanaa uppajjanti. text.5597: [03] upaadaanasampayutto ^a^M3.0602^ea^ ceva no ca upaadaano dhammo upaadaanasampayuttassa ceva  no ca upaadaanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- upaadaanasampayutte ceva no ca upaadaane  khandhe aarabbha upaadaanasampayuttaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa khandhaa uppajjanti (tii.nipi kaatabbaa,  gha.tane tii.nipi kaatabbaa).
text.5599: [03] 106^b^.^eb^ upaadaano ceva upaadaanasampayutto ca dhammo upaadaanassa ceva upaadaanasampayuttassa  ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo... tii.ni. (3)
text.5600: [03] upaadaanasampayutto ceva no ca upaadaano dhammo upaadaanasampayuttassa ceva no ca upaadaanassa  dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati (tii.nipi, tiisupi  dvepi adhipati kaatabbaa, gha.tanaadhipatipi tii.ni).
text.5602: [03] 107^b^.^eb^ upaadaano ceva upaadaanasampayutto ca dhammo upaadaanassa ceva upaadaanasampayuttassa  ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa upaadaanaa ceva upaadaanasampayuttaa  ca khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m upaadaanaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo (eva.m navapi pa~nhaa  kaatabbaa, aavajjanaapi vu.t.thaanampi natthi).
text.5604: [03] 108^b^.^eb^ upaadaano ^a^T4.0287^ea^ ^a^V3.0740^ea^ ceva upaadaanasampayutto ca dhammo upaadaanassa ceva upaadaanasampayuttassa  ca dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo... nava... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... nava... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena  paccayo... nava... nissayapaccayena paccayo... nava.
text.5606: [03] 109^b^.^eb^ upaadaano ceva upaadaanasampayutto ca dhammo upaadaanassa ceva upaadaanasampayuttassa  ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo...pe0... tii.ni.
text.5607: [03] upaadaanasampayutto ^a^M3.0603^ea^ ceva no ca upaadaano dhammo upaadaanasampayuttassa ceva  no ca upaadaanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo,  pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- upaadaanasampayuttaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa  khandhaa upaadaanasampayuttakaana~nceva no ca upaadaanaana.m khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo  (tii.ni gha.tanupanissayepi tii.ni)... aasevanapaccayena paccayo... nava.
text.5609: [03] 110^b^.^eb^ upaadaanasampayutto ceva no ca upaadaano dhammo upaadaanasampayuttassa ceva no ca upaadaanassa  dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... indriyapaccayena  paccayo... tii.ni... jhaanapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... maggapaccayena paccayo... nava...  sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... nava... atthipaccayena paccayo... nava... natthipaccayena paccayo...  nava... vigatapaccayena paccayo... nava... avigatapaccayena paccayo... nava.
text.5612: [03] 111^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^T4.0288^ea^ ^a^V3.0741^ea^ nava, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate  nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni, aahaare  tii.ni, indriye tii.ni, jhaane tii.ni, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa  nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
text.5614: [03] 112^b^.^eb^ upaadaano ceva upaadaanasampayutto ca dhammo upaadaanassa ceva upaadaanasampayuttassa  ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo.  (1)
text.5615: [03] upaadaano ^a^M3.0604^ea^ ceva upaadaanasampayutto ca dhammo upaadaanasampayuttassa ceva no  ca upaadaanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena  paccayo. (2)
text.5616: [03] upaadaano ceva upaadaanasampayutto ca dhammo upaadaanassa ceva upaadaanasampayuttassa ca upaadaanasampayuttassa  ceva no ca upaadaanassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo...  upanissayapaccayena paccayo (eva.m navapi kaatabbaa, ekekassa muule tii.ni tii.ni pa~nhaa).
text.5618: [03] 113^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^V3.0742^ea^ nava, naaaramma.ne nava, naadhipatiyaa nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.
text.5620: [03] 114^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne nava, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, naupanissaye  nava (sabbattha nava), namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, nonatthiyaa nava, novigate nava.
text.5622: [03] 115^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^T4.0289^ea^ aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava...pe0... (anulomamaatikaa kaatabbaa).
text.5628: [03] 116^b^.^eb^ upaadaanavippayutta.m ^a^V3.0743^ea^ upaadaaniya.m dhamma.m pa.ticca upaadaanavippayutto upaadaaniyo  dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- upaadaanavippayutta.m upaadaaniya.m eka.m ^a^M3.0605^ea^  khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0...  eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m.  (1)
